1.content: Sam is a white guy with light brown hair & green eyes who has plenty of friends. Sam, his friends & family get involved in size changing. Sam is how old when his size changing adventures begin?
1.title: Sam

choices: The post office mail box (Don't Add!)
11.content:
Sam slouched down in his seat & stretched his arms as his teacher Mr. Williams droned on about some boring subject. Sam wasn't paying attention as he should be. He had let his mind drift elsewhere as he longed for the bell to ring signaling the start of the long 3 day weekend. After what seemed like an eternity the bell finally rang. Sam walked out of the classroom & hung out with his friends for a while.
Sam is a 17 year old junior in high school. Sam is fairly tall for his age at 6 feet 3 but is really skinny yet lean & athletic. He spends most of his time playing video games, hanging out with friends. Sam is a kicker/running back on the football team since he's too small to be an offensive lineman. Sam wishes he could get bigger but just doesn't want to work out that hard to get bigger. Sam has 2 younger brothers Ian & Joey. Ian is 15 in 9th grade & Joey is 13 in 7th grade. Ian is average in height at 5 feet 7 & is fairly athletic. Joey is also average height at 5 feet 1 but wishes he were as tall if not taller than Sam. Sam also has a younger sister Amy. Amy is 14 years old in 8th grade & absolutely loves her big brother Sam. Amy is 5 feet 1, has long brown hair that reaches her tight yet cute butt. Amy has an athletic build as she plays soccer, softball, volleyball & even does cheerleading.
After 30 minutes or so Sam's friends began to disperse, Sam said goodbye then headed...
11.title: 17 years old (11th grade)

choices: Sam's mom announces dinner is ready
He visits one of his younger brothers
He decides to walk outside for a while
111.content:
What Sam failed to do by not paying attention, was that he had bumped into Mr. Williams' table of chemistry equipment. In doing so he had been exposed to one of the teacher's latest works, a vial of sticky liquid, which had spilled on Sam as a result. The 17 year old hadn't really cared about it and had only felt some slight annoyance at the incident. It didn't help that Mr. Williams had scolded Sam for it, stating that he should watch out where he walked. Because of him all the work had been undone. Needless to say Sam was quite fortunate to not have being sent to detention.

Now Sam was walking back home with some minor aching. His limbs felt a bit heavy and his joints were quite stiff. However, Sam thought it was simply because of his latest football practice. What he did not know was that it was the result of his teacher's concoction. Upon touching his skin it had begun its infection. By now his molecules itself were being affected as the serum coursed through his veins, spreading rapidly all over his body.

The teenager spotted a few guys of his age as he walked along a small park. Normally they wouldn't attract any attention but Sam noticed that they were working out with the public exercise equipment. He even recognized Brad, one of his fellow football players. The guy was quite big, one of the biggest on the team, and it showed as he lifted weights with his friends. Sam envied them and their ripped muscles. He wished he could be that big, although the hard work didn't exactly inspire him to begin working out harder. Those muscles did look nice though. Even on that girl that hung out with them.

Sam arrived at his home and opened the door. He took off his backpack, almost hissing at how stiff he felt.

"I'm home!" He announced loudly for those who were present.

"Welcome home, honey!" Sam's mom answered from the kitchen. "I'll be busy making diner over here for some time. Your dad's out of town for tonight but your little brothers are in their rooms. Don't forget taking out the trash later on!"

"Will do." Sam answered her as he went up the stairs.

His limbs felt heavy for some reason, as did his arms. Every step was almost agonizing. He had never experienced anything like this before, not even after his hardest competition of football. Sam shrugged it off and continued going up.

He walked past his little brothers' rooms, hearing Ian talk to his friends over their online game while Joey was busy reading one of his comic books about super villains and super heroes. At the end of the hallway was his own room which he quickly entered.

Sam sighed as he dropped his backpack and sat down on his bed. The aching was really getting to him now. He let out a small groan as the feeling spread all over his body. Suddenly it didn't feel quite as painful anymore, for some reason he couldn't come up with. Instead, it felt a bit satisfying, as if he had done a workout and was feeling a 'pump' so to speak.

"This is really weird." He muttered as he wiped his forehead with his arm.

Sam stopped for a moment and held his arm in front of him. He was quite surprised by how tight his clothes felt, they were almost excruciating tight at the moment. The teenager looked at his arm and widened his eyes in shock, staring intensely without blinking.

His forearm was much thicker than it had been a while ago. There were chords of muscle now that made his forearm bigger and caused the veins to be more pronounced. His gaze went up to his bicep which had seemingly inflated to the point that it was two to three inches bigger. Sam gasped at the size of his biceps and felt one of them, marveling at how hard and dense the muscles were.

He quickly stood up and walked over to his large mirror. Sam was amazed by how muscular he was all of a sudden. His pants were very tight as they barely kept up against his expanded quads that resembled wide slabs of muscle while his calves had a nice and distinct bulge to them. His shoulders were broader as well, connected to a thicker neck while Sam's chest had broadened as well. His pecs jutted outwards slightly and pressed against his strained shirt. Sam quickly reached for his shirt and took it off with some effort, revealing the chiseled muscles that had been hidden beneath it. His abdominal muscles had improved immensely to a tight six pack of the likes that only active sportsmen could achieve.

"This is awesome!" Sam couldn't help but cheer, flexing his biceps.

He grinned as they rose to an impressive peak. Sam began twisting his arm, flexing his forearm as well as he did some different poses he had seen bodybuilders do online. Aside from their size his muscles were also quite dense. Sam just didn't feel better, he was certain that he had a lot more strength now as well.

"Keep it quiet over there!" He heard Ian yell all of a sudden. "Some people are trying to concentrate!"

"Sorry!" Sam yelled back but didn't refrain from smiling.

He had no clue what could have caused this growth spurt but he was definitely liking it. Sam felt amazing with his new muscles. Suddenly he was brought out of his self-admiration by the sound of ripping cloth. He blinked once before tentatively looking down at his pants. Just as he thought they had been defeated by his enlarged quads, now sporting large rips in multiple areas.

"Oh, great." Sam groaned. "Mom isn't going to like that."

He let out a sigh and began removing his pants. By doing so he unconsciously flexed his new muscles. Sam walked over to his dresser and retrieved a pair of baggier sweatpants. Well, at least they been but now they didn't feel so baggy anymore. He also grabbed a bigger shirt so he wouldn't rip the one he had worn earlier. One ruined article of clothes was enough.

Sam glanced at the mirror again, specifically his reflection, and couldn't help but smile broadly. He didn't know what was going but he definitely approved of it. However, he was unaware of the other changes that the chemicals had caused. Aside from making his own muscles grow, it also allowed Sam to cause others to grow through skin contact. He basically gained the ability to infect others as well.

"Now then," Sam spoke with newfound confidence as he tensed his arms. "Time to test these new guns."
111.title: Home... Follow Sam.

choices: Go show off at the park
Go to is best friend House tell him about his change
1113.content:
Esterical and, at the same time, enthusiastic, took on a big jacket lying on the doornock and dress it hard for his family don't find out about his change. Then he took some money for buying larger clothes.
He walked down the stairs and got out of home without saying "good bye".
He went to a snall clothes shop nearby.
After he get in he started looking for XL clothes. He took five shirts (two of them were sleeveless), tree coats, five T-shirts and tree jeans.
Sam called an shop assistant touching on his shoulder and asked where it was the dressing room. Then, following the given instructions, he entered there.
It took half an hour to leave the dressing room because, every time he dress a new piece of clothes he do some poses flexing his guns. After that he dressed a sleeveless shirt, blue jeans and a cute pair of shoes that someone leave in there.
At the cashier queue he noted that the people didn't stop looking for his toned arms. That maked him fell proud.
1113.title: At the clothes shop

choices: A computer program or size change formulas
113.content:
Sam said goodbye to his friends then got in his truck & headed to a friend's house for a few hours. An hour earlier Sam's youngest brother Joey walked out of school at the end of the day with his best friend Jake. Both boys were 13 years old, in 7th grade, play football, play video games & love to work out together. They are also both the youngest & shortest brothers in their families. However that’s where the similarities end. Joey is the youngest & smallest brother in his family to his older brothers Sam & Ian. Joey is average height at 5 feet 1 & real skinny yet lean & athletic weighing about 110 pounds. Joey has a flat untrained stomach with a flat chest. Joey has green eyes, short light brown hair. Joey is average when it comes to his studies.
Jake is totally opposite of Joey. Jake is the youngest, smallest muscle wise & shortest not to mention the weakest brother between him & his 17 year old brother Toby. Jake is tall as a 13 year old standing 6 feet 1. Jake is Big & muscular weighing 265 pounds. Jake has blue eyes & long shaggy blond hair that touches his broad, muscular shoulders. Jake is so Big, he’s often mistaken for a high school senior football player. Jake has a chiseled 8 pack of abs beneath a large set muscular pecs. Jake is an offensive lineman where as Joey is just a backup kicker. Jake is nearly a genius as he is in all honor classes. However his Big Brother Toby who is 17 is the same age as Sam & is Sam's best friend. Toby is a massive dude standing a towering 7 feet 5 inches tall & weighing a massive 450 pounds solid muscle yet also very fat. Toby is an offensive lineman as well.
Jake & Joey walk towards Joey’s house to hangout for a while playing video games & goofing off as it is Friday the start of the weekend. As they walk up on the front porch of the large two story house a delivery man walks up carrying a package. The man asks, “are either one of you boys Sam?” Joey replies, “Sam’s not here right now. I’m his younger brother. Is it okay for me to sign for the package? Then I can give it to him when he gets home.” The delivery man replied, “yes. You may sign for it.” Jake spoke up, “I’ll hold the package so Joey can sign for it.” The delivery man hands the package to Jake then hands the clipboard to Joey. Joey quickly signs it then hands it back. The delivery man quickly leaves as the boys head inside shutting the door behind them. Joey says, “come on. Let’s go up to my room & open the package & see what Sam ordered.” Jake replied, “but won’t you be in trouble for opening Sam’s package?” Joey replied, “don’t worry. I’m an expert at resealing packages. Sam will never know I opened it.” Jake replied, “ok. Let’s open it.” The boys quickly went upstairs to Joey’s room & shut the door behind them. Joey locked the door so nobody could walk in on them. Joey then took the package & set it down on his desk. He grabbed a pair of scissors & opened it then dug through the packing peanuts to find…
113.title: Home... Follow Joey

choices: Both him & Jake with the figurine
1132.content:
Joey dug through the packing peanuts until he felt something small & metallic. Joey pulled it out to find it was a cool looking pendant necklace. Joey put the necklace on find the pendant rested nicely on his flat chest. Joey said, "cool looking necklace!" Joey looked in the box to see a letter & pulled it out to read it out loud.
The letter read:
"Dear Sam,
Here is the magic pendant necklace you ordered. It can grant unlimited number of wishes. There's just about no limit what you can wish for. To make a wish you must either be wearing the necklace or touching it & say or think your wish. You can even change reality to fit your wish. Have fun."
Jake replied, "dude. Magics not real." Joey replied, "I think I'll try it on something inanimate first." Joey looked around his room for something to try a wish on. Joey's eyes settled on a old trophy from pee wee football. Joey grabbed the trophy which consisted of a 6 inch tall well muscled football player figurine holding a football standing on an inch high by 6 inch wide by 6 inch long platform. Joey set the trophy down in the middle of the floor as Jake asked, "so what are you going to wish for?" Joey replied, "you'll see. However you might want to back up with me."
Joey backed up against his bed with Jake doing the same as Joey said, "I wish this trophy would grow big enough that the figurine is 3 feet taller than Jake." Jake looked over at Joey & said, "dude. Seriously. It's not going to work." Joey replied, "oh really. Why don't you look at the trophy yourself." Jake looked over at the trophy & felt his mouth drop open in disbelief. The trophy had grown humongous. The top of the head of the figurine was just less than a foot away from the 12 foot high ceiling. Jake climbed up on the platform & began circling the giant figurine. Jake as Joey climbed up said, "I can't believe it. It actually worked! It actually worked!" Jake found he was about even with the figurines middle abs while Joey was about even with the figurines waist. Joey said, "you know what this means? It means we can wish whatever we want on ourselves or others." Jake agreed as he took in the full size of the figurine. Jake said, "I actually feel short for once."
Joey shrinks...

That's all Jake needed to hear. Jake jumped down as Joey said, "I wish the trophy would shrink back to normal." In a few seconds the trophy was back to normal. Jake picked it up & put where it belonged as he asked, "so what are you going to wish for now? Do you want to test it on a person? If so who?" Joey replied, "I definitely want to test it on a person. I'll test out on..."
11321.title: The figurine to normal only

choices: Grow both Joey & Jake taller & more muscular than Sam
113211.content:
Joey thought about his next wish then said, “I’m tired of being average height & size. I know exactly what my next wish is. I wish that I grew to be as tall as Jake & have the same large muscular physique as Jake. I also wish for reality to change as if I’ve always been as tall & as strong as Jake.” Suddenly Joey began growing steadily taller. Within just a few seconds Joey was able to look directly in to Jake’s eyes without having to look up as he finished growing taller at 6 feet 1. However Joey still looked skinny like always considering he just grew proportionally. So now he was just a tall, skinny 13 year old kid. Jake noticing this walked over in front of Joey. Jake lifted up Joey’s shirt to find his normal, flat, untrained stomach. Jake said, “I thought you were supposed to get like really muscular like me? But you’re still skinny as always.” Joey replied, “it was a pretty big wish. Maybe it just happens in two phases.”
Suddenly Joey felt a weird warm soreness feeling develop in his legs. His legs felt extremely sore as if he had an intense leg work out all day. Joey said, “my legs feel so incredibly sore like I get them hard with weights today but I hadn’t worked out yet today.” Joey & Jake both looked down at Joey’s legs in shock to see them visually growing larger & more defined. His calves blew up like way over inflated footballs. His quads grew larger like tree trunks. Then the warmth & soreness moved up to Joey’s torso. His once flat stomach began transforming. Eight individual tile like abs appeared on his once flat stomach hardening & growing so defined that their outline could be clearly seen through his shirt. Then his flat chest began growing & developing. His chest began growing both sideways & forwards developing into two separate massive muscular pecs. His pecs grew so large they became like a shelf. Then his shoulders & back grew wider & more muscular. Even his arms grew larger & larger.
A few more seconds later his transformation was complete. Joey walked across his room over to his full length mirror as Jake followed him. Joey pulled his shirt off & started flexing & doing different poses. Jake pulled his shirt off so he could compare himself to the newly grown Joey. Jake exclaimed, “holy crap. It actually worked! If it weren’t for the different hair color & style of our hair we would be literally twins. Which means you’re like one of the biggest, strongest guys on the football team now.” Joey replied, “I bet I’m even bigger & stronger than Sam now.” Jake replied, “ I don’t know about that dude. Sam’s 2 taller than me. I think he might be a little bigger & stronger than me. He’s pretty good sized muscle wise.” Joey spoke up, “tell you what there’s definitely one way to see if he’s still bigger than or if we’re the same size. That’s to try his clothes on & see how they fit on me.”
Joey walked over to his bedroom door with Jake right behind him. As he put his hand on the door knob, Jake said, “hey. Look at the team roster. It says your now a starting offensive lineman like me.” Joey replied, “no way. You know it says I’m one of the kickers/running backs.” Jake replied, “just get over here & look at this.” Joey walked back over to where Jake was standing & took the roster. As soon as Joey read it, he exclaimed, “holy crap. I really am an offensive lineman now.” Then Joey replied, “let’s hurry & grab some of Sam’s clothes before he gets home.” Joey walked over & opened his bedroom door then walked down the hall to Sam’s bedroom. Joey turned the door knob to find the door unlocked. Joey pushed the door open & quickly headed to Sam’s closet. Joey opened the closet & grabbed a pair of jeans & a button down shirt. Joey shuts the door & heads out of Sam’s bedroom with Jake behind him. They shut Sam’s door & quickly go back to Joey’s room shutting the door. Jake spoke up, “hey dude. What are you going to do if Sam asks you about the magic pendant necklace your wearing & the fact that he ordered it yet never received it?” Joey replied, “easy. I wish that Sam has no memory of ordering the magic pendant, no memory or knowledge of the pendants magic abilities & no memory of having seen or heard about it. I also wish that Sam when he sees the pendant necklace will think it’s just an ordinary boring necklace.”
Meanwhile at this time Sam is driving home thinking of all the possibilities of the magic pendant necklace he ordered. Sam had just pulled into the neighborhood. Sam knew one of the things he wanted to do was make himself taller & much stronger. Sam couldn’t believe that even though Joey is only 13, he’s just 2 inches shorter & nearly as strong as him. Sam felt like since he is the oldest that he should clearly be the tallest & strongest brother. Suddenly however Sam’s mind went completely blank. He couldn’t remember a single thing about what he had been thinking about. Sam now had no memory of the magic pendant as if it didn’t or couldn’t exist! Sam pulled into the driveway & got out walked up towards house as he always did without a care in the world.
Back in Joey’s room, Joey had just changed into the cargo shorts & t-shirt to find them a little big on him. Jake said, “looks like those clothes are a little too big on you.” Joey replied, “not for long. I wish I would grow 2 inches taller & my muscles would grow big enough to completely rip these clothes I have on. I wish reality would change to fit the taller, bigger me. I also wish that Jake & I would be the only ones aware of the changes to me when reality changes.” Suddenly Jake noticed he was having to look up slightly at Joey as Joey grew 2 inches to 6 feet 3. Suddenly Joey’s muscles began expanding outwards. The growth started in his legs which were quickly swelling up. Jake watched as the jeans Joey had on grew tighter & tighter. Soon he could see the muscular definition through the legs of the jeans yet still Joey’s legs kept getting larger until finally the seams blew apart completely ruining the jeans. Then the growth moved up to his torso. Jake could see his torso widening as more & more muscle added on to his frame. His back widened with new muscle. His torso grew thicker. His abs grew even more defined. His mighty pecs grew even larger, growing wider & pushing forwards straining the buttons on the shirt. Soon the buttons started popping off as they couldn’t withstand the increased growth. Even the sides of the shirt ripped open. Suddenly as Joey flexed his back they heard a loud rip as the shirt ripped in half in back from top to bottom. Even his arms grew humongous completely ripping the sleeves finishing off the transformation.
Joey removed the tattered remains of the shirt then completely ripped the jeans off leaving him in just his boxers. Jake said, "damn. You're definitely bigger than Sam now. What are you going to do now?"

Or even grow me & shrink them?”

Joey walked over to a picture of him & his brothers on the beach shirtless. In the picture Joey now towered over both Sam & Ian. Sam & Ian now looked so short & small compared to Joey. Joey sets the picture down as Jake says, “I wish I was adopted by your family rather than living in the orphanage down the street.” Joey replied, “It would be Great if my family adopted you. I’m curious to see how much I weigh now.” Ian nodded as he walked back over to where Sam was standing on the scale. The scale read 150 pounds. 1153223214.content:
Sam was relieved that the game was now over, dispite his and Ian’s team winning. Being at 5’3, he felt just a kid on the field in comparison to his younger brother Ian at 7’9. With his size and bulk, Ian was able to run a blur through the field. Not only were his legs fast, they were strong. He was easily able to launch the ball to the goal from the mid-field. Ian originally was fairly a day at the game, only being surpassed by Sam.

“Man! That was great!” Ian had the biggest grin on his face. Sam felt ragged. He and his other teammates spent most of their time trying to keep up with Ian. He basically was a one man team. 30 to 0. 30 to 0! Sam could believe it. But he just wanted some water. Upon grabbing his water bottle, he was strangled by the neck and his head got noogied.
“Hey shorty, did you keep up with Ian this time?” It was his youngest brother Joey at 6’7.
“Joey, stop that. Sam’s exhausted from the game.” Ian said confident and concern. Sam couldn’t say anything as his mouth was too dry.
“Come on, he’s always exhausted. He can’t handle playing with us.” Ian looked down at his older brother Sam as he finally drank his water.

“Did you boys have a good game?” Their mom asked as they got home.
“Apparently their team got 30 to 0.” Said Joey who was holding Sam like a football.
“Oh my, that’s 5 more than the last game. It makes me wonder if you should sit out from time to time Ian.” She said as she placed lunch on the table. Joey placed Sam in a chair before sitting. Ian took more notice of the world around him. Sam was fairly average now. Being 5’3.

After lunch, and Joey had gone to shower, Ian confronted Sam in his room.
“Crazy game hu?” Sam said sitting at the computer.
“You weren’t bothered by it? Your height I mean.”
“Maybe a little. But it sure was interesting, fun too.” Ian still felt concern and wonders how Sam would have felt if only Sam was aware of the changes.
“Hey Sam?”
“Yeah?”
“Since you tried being the small brother, why not try being a little bigger for awhile?”
“Maybe? I guess I could see how it’d be.” Sam then opened up the program.
“Can I do it?” Ian asked.
“Sure!” Ian then began typing.
1153223214.title: After the game

choices: Sam or Ian uses the computer
11532232141.content:
After thinking it better, Sam was about to rejected Joey's offer. He had just changed his size, age and life yesterday and wasn't going to undo that after a single hard match.

"What? Why would you want to be the smallest of the family?"
"It has its perks." Sam said smiling.

Although he would never admit it, the previously biggest brother never bore very well the pressure and expectations its size caused. Everyone at the school expected too much from him, to win every game, just because he was a big guy and got angry or disappointed every time he made a mistake.

He only wanted to be an average boy, at least for a while. He didn't mind his former little brother gets all the glory.

But Joey couldn't understand that, he always admired his big brother and wanted to be like him. He also believed the bigger one was, the better. All men has to be strong because they're men.

"Don't you want to grow even a little? It would make the sports easier."
"Umm..." He began to doubt. "Maybe a little growth spurt. Like two inches."
"Hehe, wait a second."

Joey typed a number quite higher than that. Sam immediately felt the changing, and as his point of view started to rise, realized the trick.

"Hey, this is too much!"
"Don't thank me yet! The muscle growth has still to affect you."
"What?"

After saying that, his muscles started to inflate, a 8 pack like Ian's rose from his plain belly, two generous pecs and biceps coped most of the space of the shirt as his shoulder broadened. His feet bursted his tiny shoes, but the reality change created new ones, size 16-USA, for a true man that had surpassed his original height and slowing down at Joey's current one.

"What have you done!?" He was really mad. "I told you only 2 inches!"
"I... I just helped you to win games.."
"I didn't want this! You tricked me! Give me the program!"
"No!" Joey refused, worried about what he would do with it. He was afraid Sam would use it to shrink him.

Sam struggled to get the computer. His brother fought back, but he was at a disadvantage... they were equally tall, but his brother had the bulkier build of the titanic Ian.

But before someone could get hurt, the mentioned teen appeared and separated them by using his impressive size.

"Hey, you're not supposed to fight, we're brothers!" He said, but both were too angry to accept it.

Joey left angry, muttering something about next time he would be big enough to teach Sam a lesson (good thing Ian had confiscated the computer).
Sam stayed with his little big brother. After his growth spurt the height difference had reduced, but there still was a good foot + 2 inches of difference, so his head was at his shoulder level.

Ben reached in & grabbed it without them seeing them.
131131233.title: Someone shoots one of them with the gun

choices: April's muscles shrink to normal or smaller than normal
April shrinks both in height & muscle
April grows in muscle & or height.
1311312332.content: Ben whispers to Ian, "I don't like the idea of April being so much stronger than me. I'm going to shrink her muscles back down to normal. Maybe even shrink her height wise. Plus we don't want her getting control of the shrink ray." Ian nodded his head in agreement. Ben fiddled with the settings & dials for a minute then aimed at April & pulled the trigger.
1311312332.title: Ben shoots April

choices: The same height as Sam but more muscular
A little taller & little more muscular
Much much taller & much much more muscular
13113123322.content:
Ben grabbed the shrink ray & started messing with the settings. Ben turned the muscle setting to shrink & turned that dial up 3 or 4 more notches. Ben then turned the height setting on & set it to shrink. Ben then turned the dial up several notches. Ben & Ian peeked into April’s room to see Sam was struggling to push April’s arm back up to the starting position. April had Sam’s arm over half way from the starting position to touching the desk. April’s right bicep was just bulging with power as she pushed Sam’s arm closer & closer to the desk. They both knew Sam has never lost an arm wrestling match to anyone much less a girl. They’ve never seen him struggle this much against anyone in an arm wrestling match. Ben & Ian couldn’t believe what they were seeing. It looked like April’s arms were bigger than Sam’s. Ben took aim at April & fired a short burst of energy. The energy from the gun struck April in the side. The energy seemed to spread out over April’s body but didn’t faze her. She didn’t seem to notice as she began losing inches in height & muscle size.
As they were arm wrestling, April began losing muscle & strength, getting weaker & weaker as the match went on. April nearly had Sam pinned when he found he wasn’t having to struggle near as hard to push her arm back up towards the starting position. As Sam looked at April, the look on her face changed from victory to desperate determination as she struggled to stop his arm from getting back to the starting position. Sam looked down at their arms & what he saw shocked him. Her arm which had previously been much larger than his own was now noticeably smaller than his & getting smaller. Sam thought to himself, “maybe the effect from the gun only lasts a few minutes.” At that moment Sam noticed he was rapidly pushing April’s arm beyond the starting position & was now just a few inches from the desk top. Sam quickly used as much strength as he could against April to end the match. April tried to stop him but was far too weak to stop him as her arm hit the desk ending the match. As Sam let go of April’s hand, he noticed something odd. Her hand looked awfully small compared to his than normal. April’s hands have always been smaller than Sam’s. But now they seem to be the hands of a child.
Ben & Ian had to cover their mouths with their hands to keep from being heard as they laugh at April’s misfortune. April had lost about 2 feet off her height. Now looked like she hadn’t touch a weight in her life. Ben motioned for Ian to go downstairs. Ben looked to make sure they weren’t looking his way & quickly walked down stairs behind Ian without April & Sam seeing him. As Ben walked ito the living room with Ian, he said, “time to see just how big this thing can make me.” Ian asked, “hey. What about me?” Ben replied, “don’t worry little dude. I’ll make you bigger in a few minutes. I just want to try it out on me first.” Ben switched the height setting from shrink to grow. He then turned the dial up several notches. He then switched the muscle setting from shrink to grow & turned the dial up as high as it would go. Once he was satisfied, Ben pointed the gun at his muscular chest & pulled the trigger, firing for a few seconds before shutting it off. Ben set the gun down on a shelf as Ian asked, “you feel or notice anything yet?” Ben turned & replied, “see for yourself.” Ian approached Ben as Ben walked up to him. Ian backed up a few steps as Ben was looking big as his muscles were growing along with his height proportionally which made him seem even bigger than he was. Normally there is just a 6 inch height difference between them with Ben being the taller one at 5 feet 6 & Ian at 5 feet tall. But now Ben had grown a good 3 feet taller & still growing. Ian exclaimed, “holy crap. You’re like an absolute giant now. I feel so incredibly short now.” Ben laughed as he replied, “yeah & I’m not even done growing yet.” Just then Ben stopped growing taller at 10 feet 6 inches but then his muscles began rapidly expanding.
Before Ben just looked like he lifted weights a few days a week. But now Ben looked like a giant professional powerlifter & bodybuilder as his muscles were literally reaching mega hulk like proportions! His shorts had ripped completely leaving him in tight boxers. Even his t-shirt couldn’t contain the growing muscles as it had completely ripped in two leaving his torso fully exposed. Once the transformation was complete, Ben resembled a Giant Mega hulk so muscular that he would put Sam to shame muscle wise. Sam now wouldn’t stand a chance against Ben as Ben was far too tall & strong. Ben walked over to where the small gun was laying & thought to himself as he picked it up, “too bad. It’s too small for me too use now.” However as he picked it up, the gun grew to fit his giant hand. Suddenly Ben felt a tug on his boxers. Ben looked down to see Ian barely reached his crotch. Ian called up to him, “hey what about me?” Ben smiled as he replied in a deep voice, “okay little buddy. Now it’s your turn. You’ve been the shorter, little brother to Sam long enough. Time for you to grow taller & Bigger.” Ben walked away from Ian & then turned to face Ian. Ben pointed the gun at Ian & pulled the trigger for a few seconds before shutting it off. Just as Ian’s transformation was beginning, they could hear some noise from Sam & April upstairs. Ben set the gun up on a bookshelf that was about 7 feet high.
Meanwhile upstairs, Sam spoke up, “I won. But somethings not right. Your huge muscles are gone. Your hands are smaller than normal. Why are you slouching so much? It makes you look really short.” April replied, “I’m not slouching. You look bigger, taller to me. I don’t know what happened to my muscles. One moment I nearly had you beat, then I felt this weird zap & tingling feeling go through out me. Then the next moment you beat me in the match. What’s really odd is my feet are barely touching the floor with me sitting here in this chair. It’s like you fired the gun at me. But there’s no way you could have while you were arm wrestling me.” Sam said, “I’ll get the gun & fix you babe.” Sam stood up along with April. As soon as she stood up, her shorts & panties fell to the floor due to her muscle loss. April gasped as she pulled them back up & looked up at Sam to find he literally towered over her like a giant. The top of April’s head barely reached Sam’s lower abs.
April said, “somebody shot me with the gun. It had to be Ben. It’s the only explanation. Mom & Dad aren’t home. You are nearly twice as tall as I am. I’m having to hold up my shorts & panties due to losing my extra muscle.” April tightened her belt as much as she could which just barely kept her shorts up as she started to cry. Sam felt sorry for his beautiful girlfriend. Her muscular, athletic body she had developed through the years of working out & eating right. Now she looked as if she had never touched a weight in her life. Her arms were pencil thin like sticks. From what Sam could see she had no visible abs any more. Even her legs were skinny & undefined. Sam knelt down & said, “April. Don’t cry. I’ll fix this. Everything will be all right. I’ll grab the gun & fix you right now.” Sam stood up & walked over to the dresser where the gun had been but now was gone. Sam said, “uh oh. The gun is gone. I’ll be right back. I’m going to go find it.” April replied, “don’t leave me here. Take me with you.” Sam walked over & picked her up then carried her like a small child. Sam held her with one muscular arm on his hip as he walked out of the room. April layed her head on his large muscular chest. She felt so safe in his muscular arms. Sam walked down stairs to find Ben much, much larger than normal. Sam was shocked to see just how large Ben was now! Ben spoke up, “Well. Well. Well. Looks like my sister is now a midget being carried by her not so big boyfriend. I always thought you needed to be taken down a couple of feet April since you are always ordering me around & telling me what to do. Now I can do whatever I want to you. Come here little midget April.” Sam set April down said, “go get help now.” April started walking towards the front door quickly as Sam said, “you’ll have to get through me first.” Ben replied, “that’ll be no problem.” Sam tried to rush Ben to wrestle him to the ground but Ben easily using just a quarter of his strength punched him in Sam’s abs. Sam was hit so hard & with so much force that Sam actually flew back & landed with a crash on the couch breaking the legs of the couch. Sam groaned & felt himself to find he didn’t have any broken bones. Sam looked up to see the gun laying on a high book shelf. Sam got up & started for the gun when someone grabbed him from behind. Sam turned to see Ian. Only Ian wasn’t his short, little brother anymore. Ian was now…
13113123322.title: April shrinks both in height & muscle

1314.content:
Once Sam got the box open he saw a letter & what looked like a computer program CD. Sam pulled the letter out. It read:
“Dear Sam,
We have sent you this reality changing computer program so you may have fun & do whatever you want. You can literally change anything & everything about anybody including yourself. You must know that you will be the only one to know how things always have been before the changes & notice the changes unless you select otherwise. Have fun.”
Sam thought this was some kind of weird joke but decided to try it anyway. He decided to change something to test it. He decided to change…

Grow a foot or two taller & more muscular
13141.content:
Sam decided to try to change himself. But what should he try to change? Sam thought of all the possibilities. He's always been a fairly tall, athletic kid growing up. Although not real, real tall. He's always wanted to be really, really tall. He could try growing himself a foot or two taller. Of course he's never been a short or average height. So he could try shrinking down about a foot which would make him average height for his age.
Of course he could shrink a foot & lose his large muscular physique to be average height & size basically skinny & average rather than tall & strong. Or he could shrink a couple of feet or so & see what it's like to be short. Or he could get even bigger muscle wise as well as grow a foot or two taller.
13141.title: Himself

131413.content: Sam thought to himself, “I’ve always been tall, real strong & athletic. I think the perfect test to see if this real is to shrink myself a foot & make myself skinny, weak & average. So here goes nothing. It probably won’t work.” Sam clicked on his profile & selected his height. He changed that to 5 feet 4 a full foot shorter than he currently is now. He then clicked on his physical stats. He changed it from large muscular build to skinny/average & weak.” Sam clicked apply. The changes started…
131413.title: Shrink a foot & become skinny, average

1314132.content:
Sam clicked Apply & waited a few seconds but nothing seemed to happen. Sam started clearing his desk off which he let get a little messy as he waited. After 5 minutes he got his desk cleaned off yet still nothing happened. Just as he was about to get up he saw a pair of thick glasses that a science geek would wear appear out of thin air on his desk by his keyboard. But that’s odd. He’s never had to wear glasses ever. Sam looked the glasses over & felt them to find they were real! Suddenly everything became extremely blurry. He felt around the keyboard for the glasses & put them on to find he could see perfectly again. Then He felt a weird cold tingling sensation shoot down his spine & through out his muscles. Suddenly his feet lifted off the floor as he had his desk chair sitting at nearly it’s highest position. As his feet lifted off the floor, he noticed the computer screen seemed to rise up a bit as if he were lowering the chair. Yet he wasn’t! He looked down to see not only were his arms getting shorter but they also got thinner & smaller as his muscular biceps, triceps & forearms shrank in size to average even skinny looking. They didn’t look defined at all! It was then he realized his large muscular pecs had shrunk, deflated leaving him with a flat chest. He looked down at his legs to see his once massive muscular legs had shrunk leaving him with small, skinny, shorter undefined legs.
Sam hopped off his chair & walked over to his full length mirror. He took his shirt off & tossed it on his bed. As he looked at his reflection he saw the transformation was complete. However he now looked like the average skinny, weak freshman that had never stepped foot in a gym or even worked out before. His abs were gone leaving a flat untrained, stomach. Even his arms & legs were skinny like sticks. He said to himself out loud in a higher pitched voice than normal, “holy crap! It actually worked!” Instead of his normal deep voice he now had a higher pitched voice.
Sam started looking around his room as he realized it had completely changed! His football posters were gone. Even his varsity football team picture was gone. Even through in the old reality he was a freshman, he was tall enough, big enough, strong enough & good enough of a football player to be on the varsity football team as an offensive lineman with the juniors & seniors. Now he would get crushed by those guys quite easily! Even the freshmen football players were likely bigger & stronger than him now! Sam walked over & looked at his freshman class schedule to see he indeed no longer played football or any sports for that matter. Sam wondered how all these changes would effect his friendships. He wondered if Ben the enormous giant senior offensive lineman & he were still friends. In the old reality even though Sam is a freshman at 6 feet 4 & 285 pounds. Ben was 7 feet 6 & 450 pounds mostly muscle but also fat with a large belly. Sam wondered if they were still friends off the field. In fact he wondered if he would be able to get along with the varsity football players now that he was a short, skinny average freshman. Before he was friends with all the guys on the team. Now he wasn’t so sure. As they would quite easily tower over him & be much, much stronger than him now.
Then he noticed along one wall was bookcase after bookcase. Each loaded with thick encyclopedia like books, science gadgets, trophies & other computer science stuff. He stepped closer & looked at the trophies expecting them to be athletic trophies. However they were all science, computer, chess, mathematics related trophies. All his football & weightlifting trophies are gone! He then looked over at his computer to see it had changed from the basic gaming computer to a super powered top of the line science computer. He even noticed he now had top rewards from science fairs. He was now the definition of a science geek. He actually felt insanely smart!
Just then. Sam realized he had to go relieve himself bad. Sam put his shirt back on then opened his door. He stepped out & shut the door behind him. He walked down the hall into the bathroom shutting & locking the door behind him. After relieving himself He stepped on the scale to find he weighed just 100 pounds. When he saw that he realized Ian now outweighs him by about 40 pounds or so. Even though Ian is 4 inches shorter, Ian is now the main athlete between him & his brothers. He is a receiver/running back on his 7th grade football team & wrestles as well on the 7th grade wrestling team. Not only that but he also works out in the middle school weight room as well as in the family home gym. Sam realized that would make Ian significantly stronger than himself as he himself literally looks as if he’s never touched a weight in his life.
Sam opened the bathroom door & walked out as Ian walked by him shirtless towards the bathroom. Ian wasn’t fazed one bit at Sam being just 5 feet 4 & skinny as a rail. However Sam noticed something odd about Ian. Ian seemed to be quite a bit bigger muscle wise & height wise than in the old reality. Ian appeared to be 4 inches shorter than Sam as his head was about even with Sam’s eyes. His muscles seemed to be a bit bigger & more developed. Sam knew that was probably because he had shrunk himself a foot in height. Ian actually has a fully developed 6 pack of abs. Ian has decent sized muscular pecs that stick out a couple inches past his abs. They are so defined & solid looking! His arms & legs also are fairly good sized & defined! Ian actually looks like a middle school receiver/running back & teen weight lifter.
Ian closed the door behind him as Sam continued downstairs to the kitchen. Sam measured himself by the door where each family member’s height had been recorded over the years. He found indeed he was now just 5 feet 4. He looked to see Ian’s highest height mark read 5 feet tall & Joey’s read 4 feet 4. Sam figured in his head that Joey would come up to just below his shoulders. Before Joey came up to just below his muscular pecs. Sam walked out of the kitchen & picked up the tv remote as Ian walked downstairs. Ian said, “hey my show I want to watch is coming on soon. You can go watch in your room.” Sam replied, “well I was in here first. You go watch in your room instead.” Sam figured Ian would still listen to him considering he’s still the older & taller brother. He was wrong. Ian stepped forward & stood face to face with him trying to intimidate his skinnier, weaker yet taller brother as Ian replied, “tell you what. Why don’t we wrestle for control of the tv until Mom & Dad get home. If you beat me then you get control of the tv. But if I beat you I get control of the tv. Deal?” Ian stuck his hand out to shake. On it. Sam replied, “Deal! I’m sure I can beat you.” Sam shook Ian’s hand as Ian squeezed very firmly more than what Sam was used to. Ian replied, “I’m not so sure about that. You might be 4 inches taller. But I outweigh you by 40 pounds & I’m quite a bit stronger. Let’s go.” Ian flexed his biceps causing a nice sized mound of muscle to bulge on each arm. They were definitely bigger than what Sam had currently!
Ian walked towards the home gym with Sam following behind him. As they walked in to the home gym, Sam took the glasses off so they wouldn't get broken. Of course everything became real blurry again but he could make out basic objects & shapes. He could see Ian just not very clearly at all. They walked over to the wrestling mats. They begin to circle each other. As Ian counted down, "3, 2, 1."
1314132.title: Within 5 minutes

13141324.content:
As soon as Ian reached zero, Sam lunged at Ian & successfully took him down. Sam quickly got him in a hold however he was no match for Ian's superior strength advantage. Ian easily broke free. They got up & circled each other again. Ian this time lunged at Sam. Knocking him down. Ian quick as a cobra got Sam in to a double lock. Ian wrapped his larger, more muscular legs around Sam's legs severely restricting them as he got him into a full Nelson. Sam tried to get out but couldn't break free & was forced to tap. Ian let him go as he had beat Sam.
Sam defeated quickly went back upstairs to his room as Ian watched tv. Sam closed his door then went to his computer & opened the program as he pondered what to do next. Just as he began to type, he heard car doors shut. Sam looked out his window to see his parents & Joey are back earlier than expected. Sam goes back to typing.
