Sam knew Ian wanted to be an offensive lineman on his football team but was too short & too small. Sam knew that Joey even wants to be taller. Sam thought about how much he wanted to grow them. He’s never been shorter than either of them. If He grew them enough so they both are taller than him that would make him the oldest yet shortest brother. Sam grows them so…
131413244.title: Sam changes Ian & Joey

choices: Sam runs into his former football teammates
Skip to Monday morning before school
1314132445.content:
Sam wondered what it would be like if he were to grow Ian from a 5 foot tall 140 pound 13 year old 7th grade receiver/running back into a 7 feet 6 huge muscular offensive lineman. He also wondered what it would be like to grow his little brother Joey from his normal 4 feet 4 inch tall 65 pound lean basketball/soccer player 9 year old 3rd grade self to a 6 feet tall muscular athlete. With just a few key strokes he would soon find out. Sam clicked on Ian’s profile & opened it. As he opened it a 3D image of Ian popped up on the screen. The 3D image was rotating giving him an exact view of exactly what Ian looks like at the moment. Sam opened up Ian’s stats which read:
Age: 13
Grade: 7
Height: 5 feet tall
Weight: 140 pounds
Sports:
Football:
Position: receiver/running back
Basketball:
Position: point guard
Wrestling
Build: lean/athletic yet muscular
Sam clicked on Ian’s height & changed it to 7 feet 6. As he did the weight & build changed automatically. The weight now read 240 pounds. The build now read real lean/athletic. The 3D image has now changed to show those changes. The image shows Ian as athletic but really, really skinny. Sam then clicked on the football position. He changed it offensive lineman. He then changed the weight to 370 pounds. He then clicked on the fat/muscle settings. He changed it so it read muscle/bone/tissue, etc as 93% & fat as 7%. The image changed to show Ian would be Huge, muscular, super strong & unstoppable. Going by the new image Ian would look more like at the very least a high school, college or even pro offensive lineman instead of a middle school offensive lineman. Sam saved the changes then closed Ian’s profile.
Sam then clicked on Joey’s profile & opened it. Again a 3D rotating image popped up but this time of Joey. Sam opened up Joey’s stats which read:
Age: 9
Grade: 3
Height: 4 feet 4 inches tall
Weight: 65 pounds
Sports:
Basketball:
Position: Point guard/Power forward
Soccer:
Position: Forward
Football: wide receiver, running back
Build: lean/athletic
Sam clicked on Joey’s height & changed it to 6 feet tall. The weight automatically updated to 170 pounds. Sam clicked on the weight & changed it 240 pounds. He then clicked on the muscle/fat settings. He changed those so it read muscle/bone/tissue, etc : 90%, fat: 10%. Sam clicked on the football position & changed it to offensive tackle, wide receiver & running back. The build automatically changed to read large athletic muscular build. Once satisfied Sam looked at the image which had changed to show Joey as a tall, muscular, strong kid. According to the image he still looked like a 9 year old. But looking at his body he could easily be mistaken for a high school football player! Sam clicked save then clicked apply. A message popped up asking if he wanted to apply the changes to both Ian & Joey or just one of them? Sam clicked both then clicked apply.
As Sam waited for the changes to happen he got to thinking about what would be like for him others to encounter his bigger, taller, stronger brothers. He knew they would easily be able to dominate him & push him around if they wanted considering how short, skinny & weak he was now. He knew they would easily dominate & be unstoppable on the soccer, football fields & basketball court. Just then a message popped up reading changes 100% complete.
Just then he heard his mother calling him to come downstairs. Sam locked his computer with a complicated password that Ian & Sam would never be able to figure out so they wouldn’t be able to mess with the program. Sam got up & opened his door & walked downstairs to see his parents, Ian & Joey waiting for him. Sam hid his shock at the sight of 9 year old Joey & 13 year old Ian. They looked completely different from the old reality. It was one thing to see what they look like on a computer screen & totally different to see them now in real life! Ian & Joey had their backs to him as he walked in. Sam walked over & stood between his mother & Joey. He actually felt really short & weak now! Joey actually looked like a high school teen athlete & weightlifter instead of a nine year old athlete. With him standing 6 feet tall now, the top of Sam’s head barely reached Joey’s mouth. Joey had large bulging muscles. Joey was still wearing his soccer cleats, Jersey & shorts. His jersey & shorts were sticking to his muscular body as he was still very sweaty from his soccer game that Sam had forgotten about. His jersey was soaked with sweat showing off his large muscular build. Sam could easily see the outline of his hard, defined 8 pack abs & large muscular pecs.
Ian looked absolutely gigantic & huge! Powerfully really! Sam guessed he wouldn’t even come up to Ian’s humongous muscular chest now. Sam hid his shock at their sight as their mother said, “your father & I are going to take care of your grandparents for a few weeks. Sam is in charge for the most part. So Ian & Joey do what Sam says to do. Check in with him & let him know when you will be home & stuff.” Ian & Joey both protested as Ian said, “but mom. Why is he in charge. I’m like a lot taller, stronger than he is! Why do I have to check in with him?” Their mother replied, “because I said so & he’s oldest & literally the smartest in the house. However Ian you’re in charge of making sure the house & everyone is safe. Now be good. Joey why don’t you go take a shower & get some clean clothes on. Now we got to go.”
1314132445.title: Ian 7 feet 6 Huge & Muscular; Joey 6 feet tall ...

choices: Sam grows taller & stronger than normal
Sam grows taller, stronger + is a super science & sports genius
Skip to Monday morning before school
13141324454.content:
Once their parents got in the car & pulled away Sam followed his Bigger, taller, younger brothers back inside. Sam struggled to close the huge, incredibly heavy 8 foot castle like wooden front door but finally got it shut as he said, “damn. That door is heavy!” Joey replied, “I’d think you’d be used to it by now! Of course you’ve always been short & weak for your age as long as I’ve known you. Plus you have no athletic ability at all. You literally suck at sports. When you tried out for football you couldn’t even keep up with the other freshmen guys. You couldn’t even come close to competing with them.” Sam knowing the truth tried to protest, “your only nine years old yet already 6 feet tall & really big & muscular & strong. Your already way taller than the average 9 nine year old & way bigger & stronger.” Joey replied as he flexed his large biceps & pecs as he replied, “true. I’m the tallest & strongest in my grade & on my teams.” His large biceps strained the sleeves of his soccer jersey. His jersey was stretched tight across his mighty big pecs showing off the definition.
Ian spoke up, “Joey’s right. You are short & weak for your age. You couldn’t pass for a freshman. Most freshmen guys are like at least 3 inches taller & 50 pounds heavier. You could however pass for maybe a 12 or 13 year old. I remember even when you were in 6th grade, people thought you were a fourth grader. Even when you were in 4th grade people thought you were in like 1st grade. People actually thought then & now that you’re my little, younger brother rather than just my little brother. Then again who can blame them when you’re so short & skinny & I’m so tall & strong! As he said this Ian struck a double biceps pose as he flexed his massive biceps & pecs straining his t-shirt.
Sam decided to hold his tongue as he knew they would never believe that he was once much taller & stronger than both of them as they honestly thought that he had always been short & weak. Sam asked, “so what do y’all want to do? Do y’all want to go to the community center pool for a few hours in a little bit?” Ian & Joey both responded, “that would be great!” However before Sam could react, Joey got Sam in to a headlock with Sam’s nose right in Joey’s left sweaty, stinky arm pit causing Sam to gag severely at the horrible smell. Joey laughed as he saw Sam’s reaction. Joey laughing said, “did I mention I forgot to put deodorant on after soccer practice yesterday & before & after today’s game?” Sam tried to get out of the headlock but couldn’t break free. Joey let Sam struggle for a few minutes before releasing him. Joey replied, “I’ll go take a shower & get clean before we go.” Ian turned the tv on as Joey went to his room for a towel & a swimsuit then headed to the bathroom for a shower. Sam went to his room shut & locked his door behind him. Sam casually looked through his drawers for a swimsuit. Finding one he then opened up his closet & casually picked a different shirt to wear to the pool. Sam found one & changed into the swimsuit & shirt. Sam grabbed a beach towel so he would be ready to go when they were. Just then he saw a box of eye contacts sitting n his desk with his name on it. Sam took his glasses off & put the contacts in. Ian knocked & called out, “hey Sam. Joey & I are ready to go.” Sam responded, “ok. I’ll be right down.” Ian responded, “ok.”
Sam took his shoes off & slipped on a pair of flip flops. Sam locked his room left with Ian & Joey. A few minutes later they arrived at the pool to find some of the players of the varsity & freshman football teams were there as well as other neighbors from the community at the large Olympic size pool & clubhouse. As soon as they arrived Ian & Joey left Sam alone to go their separate ways to play around with their friends. Sam laid his beach towel on a pool chair, removed his shirt & flip flops & started for the diving board. Just then a couple of varsity football players walked up on each side of Sam. Both guys were over 6 feet 4 & weighing more than 270 pounds making Sam feel even smaller. The larger one was Travis the 6 feet 9 inch tall 350 pound offensive tackle. Travis is a very large, intimidating guy as he has a large muscular build but also a large solid gut. The other guy is Billy a 6 feet 5 inch tall 300 pound tight end. He is all muscle. He’s strong & fast. In the old reality Sam got along well with them. But now maybe not.
Before Sam could react both of them grabbed him as Travis said, “hey look. It’s the short, science geek. How about launching a science geek into orbit?” Billy responded, “sounds good to me. Let’s do it!” Sam hearing this tried to break free but their grip on him was far too strong. They each grabbed Sam by his arms & legs then lifted him up parallel with the ground. They began swinging him back & forth all the while Sam struggled to break free. They each called out, “5, 4, 3, 2, 1. Launch!” They threw Sam as high & as far as they could. Sam screamed as he was launched through the air. Sam landed with a big splash in the mid shallow end of the pool where some Freshman & Varsity football players were hanging out & playing around. Sam landed right in the middle of them. They immediately dog piled on him pushing him down under the water. Sam thought he was done for!
Just then three other football players came barreling through breaking them up. Those three were Ben the humongous 7 feet 6 inch tall 450 pound varsity offensive lineman, Toby the enormous 7 feet 10 inch 500 pound inch tall varsity defensive lineman & Sam’s best friend a 7 feet 7 inch tall 425 pound muscular freshman offensive tackle. Several freshman & Varsity football players were behind them as well. Ben & Toby using their sheer size forcefully broke them up & pushed them away with the help of the other football players as Titan pulled Sam out of the water. Sam gasped for breath as he had been holding his breath the entire time he had been underwater. Titan lifted Sam up on his shoulder & quickly headed to the edge of the pool. Titan set Sam down on the concrete & got out. Titan asked, “are you okay?” Sam replied, “I am now. Thanks for saving me. I thought I was toast!” Titan replied, “no problem. We’ve been best friends since Kindergarten. I’m not going to let anyone bully you or push you around or anything.” Sam asked, “what’s going to happen to those guys that threw me & dog piled on top of me?” Titan replied, “they will be kicked off the team. Coach doesn’t tolerate that kind of stuff!”
As he finished speaking they heard Ben’s booming voice as he yelled at the football players that dog piled Sam a few minutes ago. Those guys totally ashamed & embarrassed quickly left. Travis & Billy thought no one had seen what they did & thought they were in the clear. However Toby & Ben were quickly heading straight for them with several football players with them. As soon as Travis & Billy saw them they tried to run away but were too slow. Toby Ben along with the other football players grabbed them & launched them into the pool then dog piled on top of them in the pool. Eventually they let them up. Travis & Billy left as they didn’t want any more trouble. Sam’s brothers were totally unaware of what happened to Sam as they were swimming with their friends.
Toby said, “hey Sam. Why don’t you & your brothers come eat & hang out at the club house. We’ve got a huge cookout going. There’s plenty of food. Hot dogs, hamburgers, chips. Y’all can come & go as y’all please. We’ll be here for a few more hours.” Sam replied, “that would be great! Thanks. I’ll go tell Ian & Joey.” Sam went & told them who were getting really hungry. As soon as they walked in to the large clubhouse they saw table after table covered with food. They filled their plates multiple times eating their fill before going back to swim for a few hours until it started getting dark. Sam & his brothers left & went home.
13141324454.title: Sam runs into his former football teammates

choices: Sam tells Ian about the computer program
Some of Sam's friends come over
One of his brothers gets access to the computer program
131413244544.content:
After they got home they each just did their own thing & eating when they wanted. Sam after dinner went to his room. Sam closed his door & locked it as he didn’t want to be bothered by his humongous brothers. Sam turns his game system on & plays some video games late into the night. Sam periodically gets up & checks on his brothers. By 10:30 pm both Ian & Joey had turned in & fallen asleep. Sam then really settled in & continued to play his video games. However his mind kept going back to his experiences through out the day from between him, Ian & Joey to the football players at the pool. Sam couldn’t help but think about the computer program that started all this. Sam turned his game off & walked over to his computer & sat down. Sam unlocked his computer & opened up the program from earlier.
Sam was tired of being pushed around by Ian, Joey & the football players. Sam clicked on his profile & opened it. He turned on edit mode. He wondered what it would be like if he were like a literal giant at 7 feet 10 yet had his old muscular physique or an even larger muscular physique while being a super science genius, mathematics genius, video game genius & sports genius. Of course with just a few key strokes he will find out. He clicked on his height & changed it to 7 feet 10 inches tall. He then clicked on sports which was currently empty & added football: starting quarterback, offensive lineman; basketball; wrestling, weightlifting. He then clicked on his weight & changed it to 500 pounds. He then clicked on the build & typed in very large muscular build, 95% muscle, bone & tissue, 5% fat. He then scrolled down to his mental abilities. He clicked on the IQ & skill section. A whole lot of subsections opened up for different types of IQ. He clicked on the Academic IQ & moved the slider as far as it would go effectively making him literally a super academic genius. He then clicked on sports IQ which then opened up each known sport. He selected all of them, moved each IQ & skill slider to Maximum. That would effectively make him a super genius of each known sport & make him a perfect athlete for each sport. He then scrolled down to video games moved the IQ & skill sliders to maximum.
Sam looked over all the changes & just as he was about to click apply, he thought about how Ian & Joey had acted. Sam felt they were both a bit arrogant so he decided to shrink them a bit. Sam saved all of his changes to his profile then exited out of his profile & clicked on Ian’s profile. Once he got it in edit mode, he clicked on Ian’s height & changed it to 6 feet 9. He then clicked on weight & changed that to 335 pounds. He then clicked on the muscle & fat settings. He changed the muscle, fat, bone, tissue to 75% & changed the fat setting to 25%. He changed his build from solid muscle to large muscular build with a large solid belly.
Sam saved the changes to Ian’s profile. He exited it & went to Joey’s profile. Once he got in edit mode he clicked on Joey’s height & changed it to 5 feet 6. He then clicked on the weight & changed it to 220 pounds. He then clicked on the muscle, tissue, bone % & changed it to 75% then changed the fat % to 25%. He changed the build to muscular yet fat with a large solid belly. Once satisfied Sam clicked save then clicked apply all. It then asked how long he wanted the changes to take & what time to start. Sam clicked for the changes to start immediately as he knew his brothers were fast asleep. He then clicked for the changes to take 3 hours or so as he was about to go to sleep as it was nearly 1 am. Sam clicked apply & locked his computer.
Sam took the contacts out as his body began to grow warm as he knew the changes were beginning. Sam stripped down to just his boxers & slipped into bed falling asleep quickly. As he slept his brothers were shrinking in height & muscle while gaining fat. Sam however was growing in both height & muscle. His muscles were growing larger & larger but also were getting more & more dense & defined! But not only was he growing in height & muscle but he was also getting even smarter. Not just academically either but in all sports knowledge & video games knowledge. Even his skills & reaction times were increasing Exponentially! By the time all the changes were complete Sam would literally have the fastest reaction times in sports, academics & video games making him practically unbeatable.
Later that morning Sam woke up to the sun streaming in the window across his face. Sam sat up & realized he through he didn’t have the glasses on or the contacts in, he could see perfectly. Sam pulled back the sheets & swung his legs out on the side of the bed. Sam smiled as his feet are now flat on the floor again. Sam stood up & looked at his clock to see that it’s 6:30 am. Sam knew neither Ian or Joey would be up for at least another hour & a half. Sam looked around to see his room looked completely different except for his computer. His room is absolutely enormous! His bedroom looked to be so big it looked to be as long & wide as a NBA Basketball court. Sam looked up expecting the 8 foot ceiling to be just above his head but found it was just over 6 feet over his head making it a 14 feet high ceiling. He looked over at his bed which is Huuuuuuuuuge! It must have been like 10 feet wide by 10 feet long. Sam looked to see there were 3 doors instead of 2 like in the original reality. Along one long wall was just bookcase after bookcase filled with thick encyclopedia like books, dvds, video games, trophies from science fairs, academic contests, sports trophies ranging from football, basketball wrestling to karate, taekwondo, jiu jitsu, mma & what looked like nearly every martial arts known. The only windows in the room were in the narrower wall behind his bed & along one long wall between the bookcases.
Along the other narrower wall is a solid steel door with reinforced hinges on it as well as a dead bolt lock on it. Sam assumes this is his bedroom door. Along the other longer wall is accommodations, accolades, awards, 3rd & 4th degree black belts from various martial arts. As well as an enormous tv with various game systems hooked up. The screen looked to be 12 feet wide by 8 feet high! There was an enormous recliner in front of the tv, obviously for himself & a couch for friends. Also there are different various sports, martial Arts posters, various newspaper stories framed as well. Along the long wall without windows are 2 other doors. Each of the doors in his room look to be 10 feet high & 6 feet wide. Sam walked over to one door & opened it to find an enormous walk in closet the size of a large bedroom. Along 2 walls are places to hang clothes. On another wall is dresser drawers. On the far wall is another huge door.
Sam walks through to that door & opens it to find his own private enormous bathroom. He looks to see he has his own huge shower that is literally 8 feet by 6 feet. The rain shower showerhead is 10 feet high. There is an absolutely enormous bathtub that doubles as a huge hot tub along a wall of windows. The tub is 10 feet wide by 10 feet by 6 feet deep with powerful jets. Sam walked over to the other door opening it to find it opens up to his bedroom. Sam looks closer at the trophies, newspaper articles that he is literally a champion in all sports including nearly every major martial arts & weight lifting. One of the articles states how just this year he has smashed the old record of a mile run which was 4 minutes. His record is now 1.5 minutes. Another article read that his neighborhood is literally the safest in the country as everyone knows just how fast, strong & trained in mixed martial arts he is. No burglar or rapist or what now would want to risk running into him. Another article reads that he is the starting quarterback & that he is so smart he can just about predict what plays the other team will use & what plays to counter them.
Sam walked back in to his close to see a floor to ceiling mirror. Sam looked at his reflection to see he had thick, powerful muscles on top of muscles. His pecs looked so incredibly huge, wide, hard as steel. He actually has an 8 pack of abs again that look so hard that you could hit him there with a steel bat & he wouldn’t even flinch. His arms & legs are so incredibly huge & sculpted coursing with pure power! Sam grabs a form fitting t-shirt & a pair of shorts & gets dressed. Sam then walks out & heads downstairs to eat breakfast.
131413244544.title: Sam grows taller, stronger + is a super science...

choices: Sam is caught by Joey instead
Sam's safe & stays like this for the day
Sam's safe & stays like this for at least a few days
1314135.content:
As soon as Sam clicked apply, nothing seemed to happen at all. Sam waited & waited. Yet after several minutes nothing seemed to happen. Sam got tired of waiting so he assumed it didn’t work at all. Sam went through out his day forgetting about the program as he played video games, hung out with friends. After a while Sam’s parents came home with his 9 year old brother Joey. Their mother said in a hurry as their father packed some things, “Sam. Your father & I need to go take care of your grandparents. They’ve had a horrible accident. So we won’t be home for a few weeks. You’re in charge. Take care of your little brothers. Ian is at a friend’s house & will be back soon. You’ll have to get something for dinner.” They quickly left as Sam said his good byes. A few minutes later Ian got home. Sam ordered pizza for dinner which arrived shortly. Sam had ordered a medium pizza for Joey to eat for dinner & later, Sam ordered a large pizza for Ian & an extra large for himself.
After watching a movie Joey had fallen asleep on the couch. Sam picked little Joey up & carried him up to his room. Sam gently laid him in the bed, pulled the covers over him & tucked him in. Sam walked downstairs to see Ian trying to move the couch by himself. Sam asked, “why are you moving the couch?” Ian replied, “I thought you & I could wrestle a few times before I turn in. It’s not like I have to go to bed on time since it’s Saturday night.” Sam replied, “true. I’ll help you move it. But you know you can’t beat me!” Ian responded, “yeah. But it gives me great wrestling practice.” Sam & Ian move the couch & end up doing several matches. Yet Ian lost every single match as he was no match for Sam considering Sam’s wrestling experience & knowledge. Not to mention the size difference. The top of Ian’s head doesn’t even reach Sam’s broad muscular shoulders. After they moved the couch back Ian turned in.
Sam made sure all the doors were locked then headed to their home gym which had top of the line weights, equipment & exercise machines. Sam finally stopped his intense, long, work out as it was getting real late about 2 am resulting in a great pump. Sam walked upstairs & peeked in to each of his little brothers rooms to check on them. They were both sleeping peacefully so he continued to his room. Sam grabbed a pair of boxers & stripped in the bathroom then got in the shower. By the time he had showered & brush his teeth it was 2:45 am. Sam didn’t realize the changes had begun. He had already lost 4 inches of height & a little bit of muscle mass as he got in bed. Sam fell asleep quickly. As he slept his body continued to change, shrinking in both height & muscle yet he was getting much, much smarter as well.
As Sam slept the sun began streaming in his windows & shining on his face. Sam not ready to wake up rolled over & went back to sleep. After 6 hours of sleep Sam finally woke up. Sam sat up & yawned as he stretched. As he opened his eyes he realized he couldn’t see well at all! Everything looked so blurry! Sam rubbed his eyes yet found everything was still blurry. He felt around his alarm clock for the glasses & put them to find he could see perfectly again. Sam pulled the covers back & swung his legs out to the side of the bed letting them dangle above the floor. It took him a second to realize his feet weren't touching the floor. Normally his feet would be flat on the floor.
Sam was just barely registering the changes in his body as he was still waking up when he walked over to his mirrored closet door. He flexed his biceps & chest. They looked pathetic. He now looked like the average skinny, weak freshman that had never worked out before. His abs were gone leaving a flat untrained, stomach. Even his arms & legs were skinny like sticks. He said to himself out loud in a higher pitched voice than normal, “holy crap! It actually worked!"
Sam started looking around his room as he realized it had completely changed! His football posters & team pictures were gone. Even his varsity football team picture was gone. Even through in the old reality he was a freshman, he was tall enough & good enough of a football player to be on the varsity football team as an offensive lineman with the juniors & seniors. Now he would get crushed by those guys quite easily! Even the freshmen football players are bigger & stronger! Sam walked over & looked at his freshman class schedule to see he indeed no longer played football or any sports for that matter. Sam wondered how all these changes would effect his friendships. He wondered if Ben the enormous giant senior offensive lineman & he were still friends? In the old reality even though Sam is a freshman at 6 feet 4 & 285 pounds. Ben was 7 feet 6 & 450 pounds mostly muscle but also fat with a large belly. He wondered if he would be able to get along with the football players now that he was a short, skinny average freshman. Before he was friends with the team. Now he wasn’t so sure. As they would quite easily tower over him & be much, much stronger than him now.
He noticed along one wall were bookcases. Each loaded with thick encyclopedia like books, trophies & other computer science stuff. He looked at the trophies. They were all science, computer, chess, mathematics related trophies. All his football & weightlifting trophies are gone! He then looked over at his computer to see it had changed from the basic gaming computer to a super powered top of the line science computer. He even noticed he now had rewards from science fairs. He was now the definition of a science geek. He actually felt insanely smart! Sam grabbed a pair of shorts & a t-shirt & got dressed.
Just then Sam realized he had to go relieve himself badly. Sam then opened his door. He stepped out & shut the door behind him. He walked down the hall into the bathroom shutting & locking the door behind him. After relieving himself Sam He stepped on the scale to find he weighed just 100 pounds. When he saw that he realized Ian now outweighs him by about 25 pounds or so. Even though Ian is 4 inches shorter, Ian is now more athletic. He is a receiver/running back on his 7th grade football team & wrestles as well on the 7th grade wrestling team. Not only that but he also works out in the middle school weight room. Sam realized that would make Ian significantly stronger than himself as he literally looks as if he’s never touched a weight in his life.
Sam opened the bathroom door & went to the kitchen. He measured himself by the door where each family member’s height had been recorded over the years. He found indeed he was now just 5 feet 4. Sam looked to see Joey’s latest mark read that he is 4 feet 11 making him only 5 inches shorter than himself. That confirmed his suspension that Joey was taller. Sam actually had to look up to see Ian’s latest height mark. It read 6 feet tall. Sam couldn’t believe it. The program actually worked!
Sam walked back upstairs as Ian walked by him shirtless towards the bathroom. Ian wasn’t fazed one bit at Sam being just 5 feet 4 & skinny as a rail. Ian appeared to be 8 inches taller than Sam as his eye level was below Ian’s chin. His muscles seemed to be much bigger & more developed. Ian actually has a fully developed 8 pack of abs which looked like they were chiseled out of granite! Before he barely had a visible 6 pack of abs. Ian has large muscular pecs that stick out well past his abs. They are so big & defined! His arms & legs also are huge & defined! Ian actually looks like a high school offensive lineman & weight lifter.
As soon as Ian shuts the door & starts the water in the shower, Sam slips into Ian’s room curious to see how it changed. Sam knows he better hurry as Ian could easily beat him to a pulp now. Although in the old reality they got along great. Still he was in Ian’s room when he wasn’t supposed to be. Sam looked around to see Ian’s room now looked like his old room. There’s football, wrestling & weightlifting posters on the walls. There’s football & wrestling team pictures on his book shelves. Sam walked over & looked at the picture of him & his brothers on the beach taken a few weeks ago. Ian looks so Big & muscular compared to Sam. In the picture Ian is standing in between his younger brother Joey & his older brother Sam. The top of Sam’s head barely comes up to Ian’s mouth. The top of Joey’s head is about even with Ian’s pecs. He’s not sure but he thinks Joey might be slightly taller than in the old reality. Joey is definitely more athletic looking with a nice defined 6 pack of abs. Sam ventures over to Ian’s desk where he sees the roster for Ian’s 7th grade football team. It has each player’s age, height, weight, position & stats listed. Sam looks down the list. However when he gets to Ian’s stats, he is super shocked! Instead of reading receiver/running back. It reads starting offensive lineman! His height reads 6 feet tall & his weight reads 240 pounds.
As soon as Sam read that, he exclaimed, “holy crap! How the heck did Ian get so tall & so big so fast? He must be a beast on the football field!” (When Sam was 13 he was just 5 feet 8 & 190 pounds.) But then because of his new superior intellect, Sam realized that when he had changed himself into a short/average height super smart non athletic 15 year old teenager, he inadvertently caused a change to happen to Ian & Joey. Plus he realized in the old reality that he himself spent a ton of time in the family gym working out everyday! With him no longer working out that freed Ian to work out as much as he wanted! Due to his new superior intellect he knew that when you work out your body produces more growth hormones allowing you to grow faster & more & get bigger, larger, stronger muscles faster. Plus the harder you work out the more growth hormones are produced meaning you grow even faster & more!
Just then Sam heard the water in the shower shut off. Sam quickly walked out...
Was he caught? If he wasn’t, did he change back or stay as he is?

13152.content:
Sam opened the box to find a small digital voice recorder & a sheet of what looked like instructions. Sam picked the instructions up & read them out loud to himself, “Greetings Sam. This is a magic voice recorder. Whatever you say into it will become reality. The person holding it will be the only one to see or recognize the reality change & know how things always was unless stated otherwise. For instance So if someone else makes a change & you or they haven’t stated that you’ll be aware of the changes, you’ll think the change has always been reality. Have fun & be careful with is this reality changing voice recorder.”
Sam picked up the small, black recorder. He turned it over in his hands & looked it over. It had a built in microphone, a red record button, a stop button, a play & erase button. Sam said to himself, “a reality changing voice recorder. Yeah right. Only one way to prove it doesn’t change reality. That’s to make a record. I’ll try to change something that can’t be explained by reason.” Sam lifted the recorder to his mouth as he pushed the record button as he said, “the outside of my house has always been stone instead of brick!” Sam pushed the stop button ending the recording as he heard a weird sparkling sound. Suddenly Sam noticed something odd about the picture of him & his girlfriend April standing in front of the house a few weeks ago before the freshman dance. April was in a very nice dress & Sam in a nice tuxedo. However the house instead of being red brick was now a stone house. Sam said, “no way. I’ve got to check the other pictures. No way it changed the house from brick to stone.”
Sam walked out of his room & went down stairs to the living room. Sam went through every photo album to see every photo of the house, each photo of Sam & his brothers on the first day of each school year showed the house as a stone house instead of a brick house. Sam went outside to the front yard & turned to look at the house. What he saw stunned him. The house literally is made out of stone! Sam quickly went inside & back to his room. Sam stunned that it actually worked pondered what to do next?
13152.title: A magic reality. Altering recording device

131524.title: Sam calls a friend over to test it.

choices: They go play video games, Sam's adopted sister heard everything
1315243.content:
Sam picked up his cell phone & called his friend Scott. After a few rings Scott answered, “hey Dude. What’s up?” Sam replied, “I got something today. It’s really weird. I’d like you to come & take a look at it with me. Maybe we can play that new video game after a while. Please come over.” Scott replied, “ok. I’ll be right over.” Before he could hang up Sam said. Ok. Remember my house is the huge stone house on the corner of Elm & Pollen. Scott exasperated said, “dude. I know your house is the big stone house on the corner. I know what it looks like. I’ve been coming to your house since we were little kids. I’ll see you in a few minutes.” Scott hung up as Sam walked downstairs to the front door carrying the small voice recorder to meet Scott as he knew Scott lived just down the street. Sam opened the front door just as Scott came walking up. Scott is actually taller than Sam by a good 6 inches at 6 feet 10 inches tall. Yet Scott is nowhere near as big or strong as Sam. In fact Scott is so lean & athletic that he’s nearly as skinny as a board yet not quite. He does have a nice defined 6 pack of abs when he flexes them. Scott does play basketball on the team at school & with Sam. Scott actually secretly wishes he could play football & be on the football team as an offensive lineman with Sam but knows as he currently is, he’d get destroyed! Sam knows this. Scott is unusually smart & intelligent especially in science, math & video games.
Sam greeted Scott, “hey dude. How are you?” Scott replied, “I’m good. What is it that you wanted me to look at?” Sam held up the voice recorder as he said, “this is a magic voice recorder. Anything that you record becomes the truth. Basically it can alter reality. I changed the outside of the house from brick to stone.” Scott laughed, “yeah right. Magic isn’t real dude.” Sam seeing he needed to provide truth lifted the recorder to his mouth as he pushed the record button & said, “Scott can now see the change I already made.” Sam then pushed stop as they both heard a sparkling sound. Scott was laughing so hard at the lunacy of it all when he saw the change. Scott replied, “wait. How could you change the exterior of your house from brick to stone so fast? I was just here yesterday & it was a brick house. There’s no scaffolding or tools or anything around.” Sam replied, “that’s because up to just a second ago you thought the house had always been a stone house. It changed reality & your memory. This is powerful & potentially dangerous. Come on. Let’s go to my room.” Sam shut the front door & they quickly went up to his room shutting the door behind them. Sam handed him the letter to read.
Scott read it then said, “dude. You’re right. This device is powerful & potentially dangerous. We should definitely make it so only you & I can use it.” Sam replied, “good point.” Sam quickly recorded, “Scott & I are the only ones able to use this recorder.” They heard the sparkling sound as they knew it was safe now. Scott continued, “I think we should test it some more now or we could test it after playing some video games on that big screen tv downstairs.”
1315243.title: Scott a tall science/gamer geek friend

13152433.content:
Sam said, “let’s go ahead & test it now. Do you want me to test it or do you want to test it first?” Scott asked, “do you mind if I test it first?” Sam replied handing him the recorder, “go ahead.” Scott spoke up, “first. Let’s ensure we can’t damage or destroy this & then accidentally cursing either of us.’ Sam nodded his approval as Scott recorded, “this recorder can’t be damaged or destroyed in any way at all by anything or anyone. This record can’t be undone even if it’s erased!” They then heard the familiar sparkling sound. Scott then smiled as he recorded, “I am the best, strongest & biggest muscle wise offensive lineman on Sam’s team.”
They heard the sparkling sound as Scott began growing not only taller but larger as well. He grew quickly passing the 7 foot mark & rocketed up to nearly a feet as he finished growing taller. With his shoes on which seemed to have grown with him, His head was just even with the top of the 8 foot door making him 7 feet 10 a full foot taller than normal. His legs had already grown absolutely huge & powerful! His calves & quads literally dwarfed Sam’s even though Sam’s is in no way small. They looked so hard & strong that they looked like they could crush concrete blocks. His abs morphed into a full blown 8 pack. His lats had incredibly big & powerful along with his delts & shoulders becoming incredibly wide giving him the look of the v taper. He looks so incredibly wide yet powerful as his pecs literally blew up from their normal small size to Huuuuuge proportions! They looked like two massive slabs of meat stuffed under his skin. His arms blew up to massive epic proportions! They looked so incredibly huge & defined, so strong that they could be mistaken for thick tree trunks or iron coming out of his torso. His clothes changed from extremely tight fitting to custom tailor made form fitting clothes showing off his huge muscular physique. By that time his transformation was complete!
Scott said, “so what do you think of my transformation to being the biggest, strongest, best offensive lineman on the varsity football team?” Sam looking unimpressed said, “what transformation? You’ve always been like way, way taller, bigger & stronger than me ever since we became friends back in first grade. Not to mention a much better football player than me as well. Even the newspaper says that.” Sam picked up the newspaper laying on his desk that wasn’t there a few minutes ago & handed it to Scott. Scott read it, then said, “Sam remember what the letter said. It said that since you didn’t make the recording or holding the recorder that you wouldn’t notice the change, that you would think I had always been like this unless you or I had previously recorded for you to notice the change.” Sam not looking like he’s not totally convinced said, “I think you’re right. The letter does say that. My mind must have been altered though to think you’ve always been like this. I think we could do another test like this. So do another test.”
Scott set the paper down then noticed a few other things: the variety football team roster, picture & Sam & Scott’s recorded mile run times. Scott said, “look at the varsity team roster. I’m now listed on there as a starting offensive lineman. Look at the team picture. Not only am I in the picture, but I’m literally the tallest & biggest guy on the team! Plus look at this paper. It has our recorded mile run times on it. It says your mile run time is 7 minutes 30 seconds. My time is 4 minutes flat. That means I’m nearly twice as fast as you are.” Sam said, “I know my memories have been altered but I remember you always being the tallest & biggest on the team. I also remember you always being faster than me as well. But were you always faster than me?” Scott replied, “no. In the old reality even through I was still taller than you, you would have easily out run me with me eating your dust.” Sam asked, “Is there anything else that looks different about my room or anything?” Scott looked around & stopped in front of a picture of Sam & Scott on the beach shirtless that had just been taken a few weeks ago. Scott spoke up, “look at this picture! In the old reality in the picture the top of your head was level with my nose. But now in the picture you don’t even reach my shoulders.” Sam said, “well. Now we know it works & really does change reality & people’s memories. So maybe one more test. But this time make it so we both know how things always were & can see & know whatever changes are made.” Scott lifted the recorder to his mouth & pressed the record button as he said, “Sam will recognize the changes I already made & will know how reality was before & after this last change I made. Sam & I will know & see all changes made with this recorder from now on.”
As soon as Scott finished speaking & pushed the stop button they heard the sparkling sound. Sam said, “ok. Let’s do one more test.” Scott asked, “what do you want done?” Sam replied, “how about…”

Make it so I’m tall enough, big enough, strong enough & good enough that I’ve got multiple offers from the top college football programs around the country.” Scott spoke up, “okay.” Scott lifted the recorder to his mouth as he recorded, “Sam is now the Best, tallest, fastest, biggest, strongest, smartest 18 year old high school senior offensive lineman in the country! Sam is literally a genius at football, science & video games & so good at football that he literally has offers from all the top Universities from around the country to play football. As soon as Scott finished speaking & pushed the stop button, they heard the sparkling sound. Suddenly Sam began growing taller, larger & wider. 7 feet 4 inches tall the same height as Sam
141123.content:
Sam thought to himself, "Joey's always wanted to be taller. Now I've got just the thing to do it." Sam quietly picks the gun up & slips out his door. Sam slips down the hall to Joey's door & peeks in to see Joey is still engrossed in his video game. Sam aims the gun at Joey making sure it's on grow & pulls the trigger sending a beam of energy at Joey. The energy beam strikes him in the side as Joey isn't facing Sam so hadn't noticed him yet. Normally Joey who is 12 years old stands just 4 feet 10 inches tall & is quite chubby, fat even.
At first nothing seems to happen but then Joey seems to start growing slowly. A warm tingling feeling spreads through out his body as the growth begins to pick up speed. Suddenly Joey starts to notice his point of view seems to be rising up. Sam releases the trigger & puts the gun out of sight then secretly watches Joey's reaction.
How tall does Joey get?
141123.title: Joey

choices: Sam on height & or muscle shrink/growth
Joey on muscle & height growth/ fat shrinkage
Both Sam & Joey on height shrink
1411233.content:
Sam watched as his youngest little brother started to grow. Sam was amazed. It had only been a few seconds since Sam had released the trigger. Yet Joey had already gained at least a foot in height if not more than that. However it was hard to tell exactly how much he had grown with him sitting in his gaming chair. Joey seemed to be growing proportionally. As Joey continued playing his video game, he began to notice the controller seemed to be smaller in his hands. Just then the gaming chair began to creak & groan loudly due to his increasing weight. Joey paused the game & stood up quickly. As soon as he did, he noticed everything seemed to be smaller. Joey walked over to his bookshelf that’s about 6 feet tall. He noticed immediately it looked much shorter than normal. The top of the bookshelf barely reached his shoulders. Before it was over a foot over his head. He noticed it didn’t seem to be shrinking anymore as well as nothing else was either.
Joey did the math in his head & figured out that he was now 7 feet 4, the same height as Sam. Joey walked over to his closet as he inspected his room further. Joey noticed his closet door which was 8 feet tall also was just 8 inches taller than him. Joey said to nobody in particular, “how the hell did I just grow two & a half feet taller in just a few minutes? I’m like as tall as Sam. But if I got taller shouldn’t I have gotten leaner? But I didn’t. It’s like someone used a shrink or growth ray on me. But those things don’t exist. But the evidence is right here in front of me. This means I’m taller than Ian. Which is Great! That means I could push Ian around. Maybe even Sam.”
As soon as Sam heard that, he began having second thoughts of using the shrink ray on Joey. Sam thought to himself, “maybe I better shrink him back down to normal.” Sam grabbed the shrink ray & switched it to shrink. Sam brought it up as quietly as he could but accidentally knocked it against the door frame. Unfortunately Joey heard that & turned to see Sam peeking around the open door pointing what looked like an oversized water blaster at him. Sam aimed & fired a short blast at Joey intending to shrink him. However Joey dodged what he thought would be a water blast but was actually a blast of energy. It hit his bookshelf shrinking it down to three & a half feet tall. Sam walked in to the room & raised the shrink ray again when Joey placed a big meaty hand on the shrink ray & pushed it down as he asked, “did you use this on me without testing it out on anybody else?” Sam replied, “I tested it out on inanimate objects but not on anybody. I figured you’d want to be taller.” Joey secretly happy to be taller said, “how dare you test it on me without asking first.” Joey snatched the gun from Sam. Sam immediately demanded, “give it back. That’s mine!” Joey replied, “make me Sam! If you think you’re so strong then then come & take it from me!”
Sam sized Joey up & decided he could definitely wrestle the gun from him. Sam thought, “Joey & I might be the same height & Joey might be larger & heavier. But that extra weight & size is just fat. I’m solid muscle plus I’ve been wrestling since I was like eight years old.” Before Joey could react, Sam rushed him & tried to knock him off his feet. However Sam underestimated how strong Joey is. What Sam didn’t know & realize is Joey had been secretly working out every day for the last several years allowing him to build the same large muscular build as Sam just on a shorter frame. Plus his muscles were hidden under a very thick layer of fat. So he looked like some obese kid but was quite athletic like a lineman. With them being the same height Joey probably outweighed Sam by about a hundred pounds. Sam was able to knock him back a few feet & tried to grab the gun back but Joey kept a firm grip on it. Joey then used his size & knocked Sam to the floor as they wrestled over the gun. As they wrestled settings got changed & buttons got pushed. Suddenly the gun went off as the energy beam shot out & bounced off the mirror back at them hitting…

141123314.content:
The energy hit Sam & caused a weird tingling sensation to go throughout his body as he tried using his advanced wrestling knowledge to his advantage. Sam managed to get his big little brother in a hold by wrapping his arms around him & squeezing. Joey was fighting hard but they were about equal as strong with Joey being the same height as Sam. Yet Joey was at a disadvantage considering Sam’s wrestling knowledge & skill. Still Sam was having to use a lot of strength to try to force Joey to tap & give him control of the gun again.
Sam nearly had forced Joey to tap when he felt the energy beam from the gun hit him & felt really weird. He had been using all of his strength to try to force Joey to tap. His arms were wrapped around Joey securely with each hand gripping his other hand to form a hold so tight & secure he was sure Joey wouldn’t be able to break free. However Sam suddenly noticed his grip began to slowly weaken & his arms were loosening as if Joey were getting bigger & stronger. Noticing this Sam thought to himself, “But that’s impossible. Joey wasn’t hit with the gun, I was. That means he’s not growing. I’m shrinking! I better hurry up & make him tap & get control of the gun again.” Sam was determined & used all the strength he had against Joey to force him to tap but it was too late. What Sam hadn’t realized was different buttons had gotten pushed resulting in him not only losing height but also muscle & strength. He had lost a significant amount of height, muscle & strength but still fought as hard as he could.
Joey looked up at Sam who was laying on top of his big belly & could tell he was definitely quite a bit smaller than himself now. Joey flexed his muscles & easily broke free from Sam’s hold then rolled over on top of him to pin him down. However before he completely rolled over on top of Sam Joey forcefully took the gun & shoved it far out of Sam’s reach. Sam groaned due to Joey’s immense size & weight now fully on top of him which was making it incredibly hard to move & breath. Sam tried to get out from under him & even tried to push him off but found Joey was far too heavy.
Sam had no choice but to tap as he could barely breath. Sam tapped then was released as Joey stood up victoriously. As Sam was trying to catch his breath & recover Joey grabbed the gun & put it on the top shelf that normally he wouldn’t be able to reach considering it was over 7 1/2 feet above the floor. Sam spotted the gun & got up. Sam ran over to the bookshelf not realizing how much he had shrunken already. Sam looked up in horror to find the gun was now nearly 3 feet above his head. Sam reached up to grab it but couldn’t come close to reaching it. Sam even tried to jump but found he couldn’t jump nearly as high as normal for his size.
Then Sam felt his shorts slipping down below his butt nearly to his knees. Sam pulled his shorts but found he had to hold them up as he said, “what the hell! My clothes should have shrunk with me. Sam looked down to see his clothes did shrink with him but definitely didn’t fit him like his muscles had gotten a lot smaller. Upon closer inspection Sam saw his muscles indeed were a lot smaller. His once huge muscular pecs that once stood out nearly a foot beyond his 8 pack abs barely stuck out at all. They were still defined but not by much from what Sam could tell as he still had his t shirt on it. His t shirt was now way over sized like he was wearing his big brother’s shirt. Sam pulled up his shirt to look at his once chiseled, rock hard defined 8 pack abs in horror. In their place was a 6 pack that was just barely visible. Sam then looked down at his legs. They were a lot smaller. Even his glutes which had been huge & muscular were now really small & skinny which explains why his shorts had slipped down to his knees.
Then Sam caught a glimpse of his reflection in Joey’s mirror to see he barely could pass as an athlete. He looked average & barely athletic. He definitely wouldn’t be able to play football with his teammates anymore at least not like this. They would be literally gigantic behemoths compared to him now. Then he heard his not so little brother Joey laugh at his misfortune as he said, “well well well. If it’s not be Big brother! Or should I say little brother. Now! I always wanted to cut you down to size & now it looks like I just did!” Sam noticed he barely came up to his deep belly button. Sam demanded, “return me to normal Right Now!” Joey before Sam could react grabbed him under the arms & lifted him up high enough his feet were dangling 2 ½ feet above the floor. Sam looked at Joey’s arms & followed them up to his body then looked at his face to see he wasn’t even straining at all to hold him up. Seeing that Sam gulped hard as he realized he was in deep trouble as he wouldn’t be able to come close to matching Joey’s strength.
Joey laughed as he said, “I don’t have to do anything little brother. In fact I think it’s time for you to take a nap.” Joey then tossed Sam across the room really hard. So hard that when Sam hit the solid oak door he was knocked unconscious when his head made contact with the door. Joey walked over & made sure Sam was still breathing just unconscious. Joey then grabbed the gun & messed with the settings as he prepared to…
141123314.title: Shrunk in both height & muscle

choices: Joey shrinks Sam's fat & gives him a bit of muscle back
Joey & Sam's brother Ian walks in
Sam attempts to take control of the gun.
1411233145.content:
Joey then grabbed the gun & messed with the settings as he prepared to change his size & even Sam’s. Joey said to himself, “time to make myself gigantic & Mega strong like I’ve always wanted to be.” Joey switched the gun to height growth & turned the dial up several notches. Joey then turned the muscle setting from shrink to grow then turned that dial up several notches. Once he was satisfied, he fired the gun at his reflection for a few seconds sending a bright beam of energy at him. The energy struck him in the chest before he shut if off & set it down.
Suddenly his point of view began to rise up as his legs & torso grew longer & longer. His clothes seemed to be growing with his lengthening frame. But not only was he getting taller but he was getting bigger muscle wise. Yet his huge belly was deflating as the rest of his muscles grew bigger. His legs grew huge & muscular becoming well defined. They were like thick tree trunks of pure power! His torso began changing. He wasn’t getting any narrower. In fact he was actually getting wider with muscle. His belly however was shrinking quickly revealing his strong 6 pack abs once hidden under a ton of fat. Yet they were now morphing into a full blown 8 pack of abs. Each ab was still growing along with the rest of him yet they were gaining definition & looked to be as big as cantaloupes.
Then his already large, beefy pecs & wide shoulders began growing. His large, beefy pecs grew wider & wider & larger & larger. His pecs pushed further & further out past his massive cantaloupe sized abs. Each pec was like the size of a jumbo sized beach balls but looked as hard as iron! His shoulders & back then began growing to finish his torso’s transformation. His shoulders grew wider & wider & larger & larger with new muscle. His delts were literally reaching boulder liker proportions making his shoulders look insanely massive. His back also grew insanely wide & muscular making his shirt tighten up. His traps grew insanely huge & boulder like making his neck look insanely thick & muscular.
Just then his arms began really growing. His arms lost all the fat that was on them as they grew larger & larger & even more chiseled & defined. With each breath he took his arms surged bigger & Bigger. They were soon passing cantaloupe size as they were quickly filling the sleeves up. Within a few minutes he began to hear the sound of cloth ripping. Joey looked at his arms to see his arms were simply Enormous & full of power! They had grown so big that sleeves couldn’t come close to containing the enormous muscular arms as they grew a few more seconds before stopping as they were now the size of jumbo watermelons to finish the transformation.
Joey walked over to the full length mirror but found only his huge, muscular legs were in view. Joey looked up to see his head was touching the 16 foot ceiling. Joey looked at the small shrink gun & reached for it. As soon as Joey touched it, to his amazement the gun grew to fit his giant hand. Joey turned the muscle setting off & switched the fat setting off. He then made sure the gun was set to grow & aimed at the mirror with him standing off to the side. He fired for a few seconds growing the mirror to as tall as the 16 foot tall ceiling then released the trigger. Joey went & stood in front of the mirror to inspect his reflection.
What he saw shocked him! He was absolutely enormous! Joey barely recognized himself. His fat chunky cheeks & double chins were gone. In their place were a chiseled strong chin, jawline & lean cheeks. He no longer resembled a fat teenager. He now looked like a giant version of the hulk on steroids! His clothes had grown with his longer body. He had lost all the excess fat but now had had much much larger muscles. His pants were literally skin tight showing the size & definition of his muscular legs. Even though he no longer had a big fat belly his shirt was literally skin tight & was so short that it didn’t even come down to his belly button to his huge muscular pecs & shoulders. The shirt was so tight that you could see the definition & hardness of his 8 pack abs. Each ab was the size of jumbo sized cantaloupes. Joey knew that even if Sam were his normal height & size he wouldn’t come close to being able to match the strength of just one of his legs let alone his whole body.
Joey took the gun as he said to himself, “time to fatten you up big brother or should I say little brother.” Joey turned the size setting off then turned the fat setting on & switched it to grow. He turned the dial up several notches. He then aimed at his brother Sam that to him appeared to be the size of a lean baby all though not for long. Joey pulled the trigger firing a short blast at him striking him in the chest before releasing the trigger.
Suddenly Sam’s body began changing as he lost his lean athletic look. His t-shirt began to tighten up as a large belly began to form where he once had abs. His shorts also were tightening as his waist was expanding exponentially. Within just a few seconds Sam had gained so much fat & weight that his clothes were skin tight & looked as if they would rip apart any second. A second later that’s exactly what happened. His clothes completely ripped leaving him in the nude yet he just kept getting fatter. He already resembled a very overweight even obese short teenager. Joey walked out to grab some of his own clothes to put on Sam.
A few minutes later Sam’s transformation was finished as Joey walked back in with a set of his own clothes. Joey put a pair of boxers & shorts on him & slid them up Sam's legs but found he couldn’t zip up or even button up the shorts. Joey then put the t shirt on Sam only to find Sam was now so fat that the shirt barely covered his fat moobs coming down a few inches above his deep belly button. Joey knew just by looking at him that Sam even through Sam is. Joey’s normal 4 feet 10, he was much much heavier & much fatter than he himself normally was, but with out the hidden extra muscle mass.
Joey grabbed the gun with one hand & picked Sam up by his shirt with the other & walked over to the front double doors noticing that several things shook as he passed due to his immense size. Joey opened them & lightly placed Sam who was still unconscious & the gun outside. He then got on his hands & knees & crawled outside barely fitting through the doorway. Joey stood up & grabbed the gun & Sam as walked to the curb. Seeing no one around he turned to face the house & set Sam down. Joey turned the fat setting off & turned the gun to grow & turned the dial down several notches.
Once he was satisfied he fired a short blast at the house then released the trigger. Within just a few minutes the house had grown noticeably bigger. Joey grabbed Sam & walked back up to the house to find the house was so much bigger that the normally 8 foot double doors were now 20 feet tall. It was if he were back to normal height. He walked in shutting the door behind him to find everything had grown with the house. Joey set Sam down then noticed a button labeled reality changer. Joey pushed it & a question appeared on the digital screen on the shrink gun. Joey read the question, “change reality to fit all previous changes made with the gun or just the last one? Or all changes past & future?” Joey selected all previous changes. Then another question popped up. It read, “do you wish to allow anyone to know how things have always been?” Joey typed in himself & Sam. It then read reality changed & changes applied.”
Joey noticed Sam was beginning to wake up. Sam groaned as he tried to sit up but found it extremely difficult as it felt like there was something heavy laying on top of him. Sam lifted his head & looked towards his feet yet couldn’t see them due to his now enormous belly blocking his view. Sam groaned as he rolled over on to his side. After several attempts Sam finally managed to get to his feet. Sam looked around in shock at how big everything was. Sam walked into the kitchen. Sam looked around at the counters towering far above him. Sam realized even if he were to reach up he wouldn’t be able to reach the countertops. He guessed if he were still 4 feet 10 that counters were probably at least 10 feet high. Sam came to the conclusion that the only explanation was that Joey shrunk him even shorter & made him extremely fat. At least that’s what Sam thought until the floor began to shake then stop then shake again. Along with the floor shaking came loud booms. Boom. Boom. Boom. Boom. Like foot steps of someone very massive!
Suddenly a loud laugh rumbled from far above & behind him. Sam turned around to see he was eye level with the largest most muscular & widest knees he had ever seen. Sam looked up, craning his neck to look to see who it was. Sam was blown away by how large & muscular this person was as he kept looking up & up yet still hadn’t even looked past the massive pecs. Finally looked at the face of the giant person. Sam gulped hard as he barely recognized Joey. Joey boomed, “well if it isn’t my big or should I say little brother Sam.” Before Sam could react Joey lifted up his massive left foot & brought it over to Sam knocking him down. Joey placed his foot directly on top of Sam but not applying any real pressure. The foot was literally nearly ¾ as tall as he was. Sam pushed with the foot up but then Joey started applying some pressure. Sam pushed as hard as he could but he couldn’t match Joey’s strength. Joey lowered his foot until it was laying firmly on top of Sam & demanded, “I’ll let you up if you declare I’m the best brother & that I’m in charge & that you’ll do everything I say. Otherwise I’ll just crush you.” Sam pushed with all his might but couldn’t budge Joey’s massive foot at all. Sam gave in as he shouted, “okay. Okay. You’re the best brother. You’re in charge & I’ll do whatever you tell me to do! Just don’t crush me please!” Joey removed his foot & let Sam up.

Ian stepped inside & started to approach the two of them to break them up when suddenly a bright energy beam shot from the gun bounced off Joey’s mirror & back towards the teens. The energy beam missed the two bigger teens & struck Ian right in his defined chest. Ian said quietly, “what the hell was that?” The two bigger teens didn’t hear him & didn’t know he had walked in on them. They didn’t even know the gun had actually gone off. Ian felt weird as a strange warm tingling feeling spread throughout his entire body. Suddenly Ian was aware that his eye level was rising up quickly. Ian decided to let match go on for now considering what was happening with him. A few seconds later Ian noticed the top of the 8 foot tall door frame was now level with his nose & dropping even lower. Ian did the math & figured he was now 8 feet 4 & growing. That meant he was like a foot taller than Sam.
Suddenly he became aware that his shorts felt like they were getting tighter causing him to look down. What he saw shocked him! His calves & quads were growing to such enormous defined muscular proportions that would they make Sam’s look absolutely puny. And Sam’s calves & quads are quite large for someone of his height. Ian’s quads were getting so big that the shorts were literally skin tight. Even though his clothes were growing with his lengthening frame they weren’t getting any bigger. As his quads finished growing, his glutes began growing larger & wider tightening up his shorts even further. Then the muscles in his torso began growing. His lean defined 6 pack abs began growing, changing. His abs morphed into a full blown 8 pack that looked like they were chiseled from granite! Then Ian looked back over towards the door to see the top of the 8 foot door frame barely reached below his shoulders. Or should I let it go on & see who wins then see who's shrink gun it is?”

choices: Ian shrinks Sam height & muscle wise

1411233553.content:
Ian decided to break up the wrestling match/fight. Ian in a commanding tone spoke up, “hey. Break it up you two. Don’t make me separate you two!” Sam not looking up as he recognized Ian’s voice replied, “Ian you wouldn’t be able to pull me off of him & stop us from fighting.” Joey knowing he was the same size & height as Sam replied, “yeah. You can’t separate us.” Ian seeing no choice stepped forward & placed a large hand on each of their shoulders & forcibly pulled them apart. Then he forced them to stand up when they realized just how much taller & bigger he was than them. Both 7 foot 4 inch tall teens barely reached the bottom of his huge muscular pecs. Sam exclaimed, “holy crap. You’re so huge & muscular! The gun must have struck you as we were wrestling over it. The growth setting for both height & muscle must have gotten activated while we were wrestling for control of the gun.” Ian said, “yes. They must have as you can see it made much taller, bigger & stronger than you both. Now you two need to settle down. First of all who’s size gun is this?” Sam replied, “It’s mine. Some one gave it to me as a gift.” Ian replied, “okay. Why were you two fighting over it?” Both boys tried to answer at the same time causing Ian to squeeze the pressure points in each boys shoulders causing them to yell out in pain. That was something Ian never would have been able to do to Sam at his normal height & size. Ian eased up as he said, “okay. Joey tell me what happened first.
Joey replied, “I was just sitting in my gaming chair playing my video games when I felt a weird zap but I didn’t think anything about it. But then I noticed the controller seemed to be getting smaller in my hands. Then I heard my gaming chair creaking & groaning from my increasing size & weight. So I stood up & noticed how everything looked smaller to me including the bookcase & doors. So I thought if I got taller I should have gotten leaner but I grew proportionally. Then I heard a bang against my door when I saw Sam holding the gun. I asked him if he had used it on me without using it on anyone else. He said he had tested it on inanimate objects first then tested it on me. He said he figured I would want to be taller so he grew me taller. But he didn’t ask my permission first. I got mad about that & took the gun from him. He demanded it back & I refused to give it back. I then said if you think you’re so strong then come & take it. He then tried to tackle me but I held my own & so we started wrestling over it. By the way where is it?”
Ian replied, “it’s on the shelf behind my head. Don’t even try to grab it either of you.” Sam & Joey weren’t even considering trying to for it as their much taller & larger brother Ian easily held them apart with a huge muscular hand on each of their chests. Ian asked, “is that what happened Sam?” Sam replied, “yes. I shrunk my desk, bed & other furniture down to size then grew it back to normal size. No. I didn’t ask him if I could use it on him. I should have. But I heard him say when he realized he was as tall as me, “This means I’m taller than Ian. Which is Great! That means I could push Ian around. Maybe even Sam.
Ian replied, “ok. Well you both were in the wrong. However Sam like you said you should have asked him first especially since you hadn’t tested it on anyone yet. Joey you know you’re not supposed to take what’s not yours. Plus I’ve seen you push kids that are smaller than you around so you would have pushed me around had I not been shot with the gun while you two were wrestling & grew as tall & big as I am now!” For emphasis Ian flexed his new larger biceps & pecs which easily put both shorter teens to shame. Ian continued, “so I feel like you both need to be punished for what you two did.”

14112335535.content:
Ian said, “that being said. I’m gonna wait for Mom to get home & decide how to punish you two. It’s only right. I will also keep control of the gun until she gets home. Now Joey why don’t you go back to playing your video games & Sam why don’t you go lift weights or something & leave Joey alone.” Sam nodded as he walked out. Joey sat down on the floor against his bed so he wouldn’t break his gaming chair & resumed his video game. Ian grabbed the shrink gun & ducked low to walk through the door. Ian looked in Sam’s room but didn’t see him & headed down stairs as he heard the weights clanging as Sam worked out in the gym. Ian walked into the living room & sat down on the couch which groaned due to his size but held him. Ian turned the tv on & watched some of his dvr shows for a little while.
About an hour later their mother Pam walked in. Pam is a tall woman at 6 feet 3 inches. Pam was wearing a nice business suit that showed off her body. She did have a soft belly that wasn’t too big but also showed off her athletic body that she still managed to have from her college days of basketball & volleyball. She has long blonde hair & blue eyes. She waved at Ian & called out, “hi Ian.” Ian replied, “hey Mom. I really need to talk to you.” Pam replied, “Let me go change first.” Ian replied, “ok.” Pam walked into her big first floor master suite bedroom & shut the door. She stripped down & grabbed a pair of shorts & a t-shirt to put on. After getting dressed Pam walked out to where Ian was watching his shows. Pam stopped when she caught sight of Ian.
Pam exclaimed, “how’d you get so big & muscular? Is that a muscle suit that you’re wearing? I just saw you this morning & you were still your normal skinny athletic self then.” Ian stood up as he said, “mom. That’s one of the things I was going to tell you about.” Pam was shocked at just how tall Ian was compared to her. Normally he is 6 feet 4 just an inch taller. But now that he is 10 feet tall she barely reaches his mid to upper abs which look impressive as he is still shirtless. Pam exclaimed, “holy crap. You’re gigantic!” Ian replied as he picked up the shrink gun beside him, “I know mom. David laughs at his friend's bare feet saying "Dude, try my flops on. You'll get your feet all dirty walking on this dirty floor". David kicks off his own flops from his tan and hairy bare feet with trimmed toes and hands them to Sam. Sam puts them on his own feet.
"Thanks dude!" Sam exclaims smiling.
David retrieves some stylish men sandals and puts them on his bare feet. "I like these better. My toes can still breathe, but my foot won't tan weird".
142212.title: Sam stops shrinking for now
