151.content:
Sam is an incoming freshman in college standing 7 feet tall & very muscular yet lean from a growth spurt he had over his senior year of high school. Sam has brown hair & green eyes. He was offensive lineman in high school but also played back up Quarterback, receiver & running back.
Where does the story begin?
151.title: 19 freshman

1511.content:
Sam is an offensive lineman man on the football team as a freshman. Sam is the second tallest guy on campus. The tallest being one of his roommates, Tyler who is 7 feet 10. Tyler plays basketball. He has long, shaggy brown hair. His three other roommates are Ben, Jake & Toby. Ben has been his best friend since like 1st grade. He is an offensive lineman also. He is a very large guy, very muscular but also very fat also. He has short blond hair & blue eyes. Then there's Jake a large wrestler. Jake stands 5 feet 11 with a large muscular build. Jake wrestles, lifts weights everyday! It shows in his large muscular chest 8 pack abs, 19 inch biceps. Jake also has a black belt in Karate, jui jitsu, tae kwon do, kick boxing & other martial arts. Jake has blond hair with green eyes. Last there is Toby the shortest out of all of them. Toby may only be 5 feet 3 inches tall but he is lean with a large muscular/athletic build from playing soccer, weight lifting & running several times a week. Toby has brown hair with green eyes.
Sam is sitting in his science class listening intently to his science professor as the end of class approaches. The beautiful blond professor Ms. Smith was about 5 feet 6 inches tall & has a large bust. As she finished teaching & dismissed the class she called out, "Sam. Would you stick around for a few minutes please?" Sam replied, "yes ma'am." Sam walked up to the front as the last of the students walked out. As Sam approached the height difference became apparent as she craned her neck back to look way up to Sam. She spoke up, "Sam. Some of my colleagues are performing an experiment on some students & need one more volunteer. You would be well paid. Are you interested?" Sam replied, "oh yes. But what kind of an experiment is it?" She replied, "it's basically a size changing experiment. They would like to see how you react or respond as your your roommates, classmates & world seem to grow around you as you shrink in height. You will from the moment you wake up be shrinking until you reach the tiny height of an inch tall. When you take a nap or go to sleep then you will begin to grow back to normal. The experiment will last a week. They will require you to do a blog about your experiences. So what do you think?" Sam replied, "I'd like to do it. When do I start?"
She responded, "right now. Follow me." Sam followed her as she led him down several corridors till they walked into the medical science lab section of the building. As they walked in, Sam noticed several nurses standing around & a few doctors. The lead doctor a tall balding man about 6 feet 3 walked over & greeted them, "I'm Dr. Bob. Ms. Smith is this the student you were telling me about?" She replied, "yes. This is Sam. He would like to participate. I've got to be going now." She turned & walked out as Dr. Bob handed Sam a clip board to fill out as he said, "fill these out. Then we will start the experiment. You will shrink continually about 3 to 6 inches an hour until you reach 1 inch tall. You will begin to grow back when you sleep. Now when we initally start the experiment you wil shrink an unspecified amount. Are you ready to start?" Sam nodded as he handed the clip board back to Dr. Bob.
How do they start the experiment?
1511.title: Science class

choices: 1 foot 9 inches to 5 feet 3 inches tall
15111.content:
Dr. Bob replied, "follow me." Sam followed him into a curtained off area where there was a large recliner by a lot of medical equipment. Dr. Bob spoke up, "remove your shoes then stand against the wall so I may measure you." Sam removed his shoes then stood against the wall. As Dr. Bob stood in front of him looking up to measure him, Sam noticed Dr. Bob came up to about Sam's nose. He replied, "Sam. You measure exactly 7 feet tall. I'm going to check your vital signs & blood pressure." After Dr. Bob finished checking his vital signs he replied, "go ahead sit down in the recliner & we'll get started." Sam sat down as a nurse came over & began hooking Sam up to the medical equipment to monitor his vital signs. She also inserted an iv then motioned to Dr. Bob that everything is ready.
Dr. Bob spoke up, "Once I start the iv you will get sleepy. As you sleep you will begin shrinking to start the experiment. However we don't know exactly how much you'll shrink while asleep. Also you may go ahead & put your feet up & recline if you like. Are you ready?" Sam nodded as he pulled the lever to put his feet up &recline back. Dr. Bob pushed a button on the monitor which began the iv of shrinking serum. He then walked off as the nurse asked, "so handsome. You are really tall & muscular. Do you play sports or work out?" Sam replied, "I work out every day. I just finished playing my first season of football here. I'm an offensive lineman." As Sam & the nurse were talking Sam began yawning as his eyes grew heavier & heavier until he fell asleep. As Sam slept he began to shrink.
How much did Sam shrink?
15111.title: Shrink serum through an iv

1512.content:
Sam walked inside the athletic building & walked past the football locker room towards the head football coach's office. Sam knocked on the large, heavy wooden door. A few seconds later the door was opened by a tall, big muscular yet fat man just a noticeably taller than Sam by a good 8 or 9 inches! Sam spoke up, "I'm Sam. I'm looking for the head football coach." The man introduced himself, "I'm the head football coach. I'm Bob. You can call me Coach, Coach Bob, Big Bob as I'm called around campus or just Bob. Why don't you come in. Shut the door so we can talk about you playing football here." Bob stuck out his large hand & shook Sam's hand as he squeezed nearly crushing Sam's hand.
Sam visibly winced as Bob released his hand. Sam was shocked at just how strong Bob seemed compared to him. He had never met anyone that could nearly crush his hand in a hand shake. Sam shut the door then sat down as Bob walked behind his large desk. Sam was blown away by how tall & large Bob is compared to him. Not only was Bob taller but he was also Much larger muscle wise than Sam. He however did have a large belly that was straining the buttons on his shirt. Sam actually felt. Kind of short & average for once. He has never actually met anyone so much taller & larger than him. Bob definitely had the muscles & strength of some one who seriously works out. But he also had the large of belly of some one who eats very well!
The chair groaned as Bob sat down. Bob spoke up, "You seem taller than the last time I saw you play last fall at the high school. How tall are you now?" Sam replied, "I'm 7 feet tall now. At the end of the fall football season I was 6 feet 4. But then I got a Big growth spurt that lasted all winter, spring & lasted into the beginning of summer. I'm sure I'm one of the tallest & most intimidating guys on the team now." Bob responded with a laugh, "yes. You are definitely one of the tallest guys on the team. I'm sure you will be intimidating height wise but you could definitely be bigger! You were Really Big & muscular at 6 feet 4 making you very intimidating. I know you wanted to be an offensive lineman, But now at 7 feet tall, I think you're just too lean & skinny due to your latest growth spurt. You definitely need to be even bigger than you are now. So for now until you get bigger you will be a receiver & running back. With your long legs & great speed the other team won't be able to catch you. How does that sound to you?"
Sam replied, "That sounds good. I will work out even harder & do what I can to get bigger. I definitely want to be an offensive lineman again. What kind of size do you want me to put on?" Bob replied, "I'd like you to gain..."
1512.title: In the football coach's office

15122.content:
Bob replied, “I’d like you to gain both muscle & fat. You definitely could be stronger. But I also think you could use some padding to make yourself seem even larger than you already are. I suggest you eat as much as you possibly can. Never let your stomach get completely empty. But also you should hit the gym everyday for a good 2 hours or more focusing more on weight lifting & getting bigger & less on cardio.” Sam nodded as he stood up along with Bob. Sam spoke up, “ok. I’ll do my best. I’ll see you at practice next week.” Sam stepped out into the hall shutting the door behind him & headed back across campus to the large Athletic dormitory. A few minutes later Sam arrived & rode the elevator up to the 8th floor which was the top floor in the building. Sam walked out to the door of the super suite he shared with his three friends Ben, Jake & Tyler. The super suite took up nearly the entire floor. Sam & his jock friends were some of the few rich enough to easily be able to afford the luxury suite. Their suite was very spacious & luxurious. Each of them had their own private extra large bedroom & bathroom with a supersized shower. All the doors were extra tall at 8 feet & extra wide at nearly 5 feet. The ceilings were like 14 feet high. They even had their own full sized kitchen with top of the line appliances. They each liked to cook a lot of their meals there but would also go down to the dining hall also.
Sam’s three friends are all athletes but each in a different sport. Tyler the tallest out of the four of them actually towered over everybody at 7 feet 10 inches tall. He is muscular yet very, very lean nearly at the point of being skinny. He has brown, long shaggy hair. Tyler plays basketball & loves to play video games. Then there’s Ben who is Sam’s best friend since like 1st grade. Ben is an absolutely enormous guy literally. He stands nearly as tall as Sam at 6 feet 10 inches tall but is much larger muscle wise yet is also very fat. Ben has blond hair with blue eyes. He is an offensive lineman & is a literal genius as his iq is off the charts. Then last there is Jake the shortest out of all of them at 5 feet 11 inches tall. Jake is a wrestler & weight lifter. Jake has been wresting for several years mastering all the moves, locks & holds. Jake also has a black belt in Karate, kick boxing, tae kwon do & Jui jit su. Jake works out nearly everyday as it shows from his chiseled pecs, 8 pack abs to his large 19 inch biceps. Jake has blond hair & green eyes.
Sam walked in to find Tyler & Ben sitting on the large couch playing a video game against each other. Jake was no where in sight. Sam greeted them as he walked, “hey guys. How’s it going?” Ben replied, “really good. I’m going to beat Tyler in this game.” Tyler broke in, “yeah. We’ll see about that. Don’t count your chips before the game is over.” Sam asked, “Where’s Jake?” Ben replied, “Jake went out on his daily 14 mile run. He should be back soon. You know he likes to run down the stairs instead of riding the elevator down. Then runs down to the river trail & runs that for several miles before running back to campus. Then he likes to run up the stairs all the back here. Man he sure is dedicated!” Tyler & Sam agreed as the door opened behind Sam. Sam turned to see Jake walk in out of breath carrying a large heavy box causing his massive biceps to flex. Behind Jake was a shorter athletic guy behind him carrying a large box also. He seemed to be around 5 feet 3 with short brown hair & green eyes. He was fairly lean yet muscular & athletic. Jake’s shirt was fairly tight & soaked with sweat as he had just finished another long run. The top of Jake’s head barely reached above Sam’s broad shoulders. Jake looked up at Sam & spoke up, “hey dude. Just got done with another run. I was about to run up the 8 flight of stairs when I saw this guy carrying some heavy boxes. I asked him what floor he was staying on. He said floor 8 & showed me the paper stating he's the other room mate we've been waiting on to arrive. This is Toby. Guys. Lets help him move in his things.”
Sam extended his giant hand to Toby & introduced himself, "Toby it's nice to meet you. I'm Sam. I'll be playing football here along with Ben." Toby shook Sam's hand noticing it practically engulfed his own hand & responded, "it's nice to meet you to. I would have been here earlier this morning but it took longer than I thought to drive from home across country. I'll be playing on the soccer team here." Ben & Tyler also introduced themselves. Jake said, "come on Toby. I'll show your room so we can set these boxes down. Then we'll all help you move all your things up okay?" Toby replied, "that sounds great." They all headed downstairs & outside to Toby's truck. The bed & cab was loaded with boxes & assorted things. They each grabbed a large box or two & carried them up. After several trips they had finished moving Toby in. As Toby went into his room to unpack & settle in, Jake asked, "so how are you? How'd your meeting with the football coach go?"
Sam replied, “I’m good. The meeting went good but looks like I’ll be playing as a receiver/running back until I get quite a bit bigger! He wants me to really bulk up adding both muscle & fat.” Jake replied, “you should definitely start working out with me & Ben to start adding even more muscle size. I may be the shortest here but I’d bet I’m the strongest pound for pound. If you & I were the same height I’d be willing to bet I’d be much stronger than you.” Having said this Jake flexed his enormous 19 inch biceps & large chest. His shirt strained to contain his huge chest & enormous biceps. Suddenly his biceps began to tear through the skin tight sleeves. Jake laughed, “oops. Didn’t realize my biceps had gotten big enough to rip my sleeves. Well I’m going to go jump in the shower.” As Jake went into his room & shut his door, Ben spoke up, “you should definitely hang with me more at the buffets to add some serious size to your frame. Maybe after Jake showers we’ll all go the buffet. For now you can play the winner of this game. How about that?” Sam replied, “that sounds great. I’ll play the winner.”
Tyler & Ben resumed their video game. Tyler gave it his best shot but Ben quickly & easily beat him. Sam sat down & started playing against Ben as Tyler looked on. They were so engrossed in the game they didn’t realize Jake had finished his shower & had walked out to watch them play. Jake was just wearing a pair of shorts but was shirtless showing off his well developed large muscular upper body as Sam beat Ben. Sam exclaimed, “yes. I won! I finally beat you.” Just then there was a knock at the door. Tyler opened the door to find a delivery man standing there with a package. Tyler took the package then shut the door. Tyler handed the package to Sam saying, “this just came for you. Don’t know who it’s from. There’s no return address but it’s got your name on it.” Sam took the package & said, "I'll open it later after dinner or so." Sam took the package to his room & came back to find Ben & the new roommate Toby playing a video game against each other. Sam couldn't help but notice how short & scrawny Toby seemed compared to Ben.
After an hour of playing Toby ended up beating Ben. Suddenly Ben's stomach growled loudly. Ben asked, "any one want to join me down at the All you can eat buffet?" Sam, Toby, Tyler & Jake all agreed to join Ben. A few minutes later they walked in to the buffet on campus. Ben pulled his wallet out & payed for every body. They grabbed their large drink cups & filling them up found a large booth to sit at with Sam in the middle. They each went & grabbing a plate began piling it high with food. Sam had grabbed a steak with mashed potatoes, mac & cheese, broccoli, green beans, spaghetti & fried chicken. Sam sat down & began devouring the food. Sam quickly finished his 1st plate & filled up a second plate. After about 35 minutes Sam & Ben were the only two still eating. However Sam was definitely slowing down after 5 plates of food piled high. Ben noticed this & said, "come on. You can't stop now. You got to learn to eat more if you want to get bigger!" Sam burped fairly loud & apologized then replied, "but I'm getting so stuffed." Ben reached over & loosened Sam's belt by a few notches to relieve the pressure. Tyler who was sitting on the other side of Sam lifted up Sam's shirt to show his usual flat muscular stomach was now a little bloated yet his 8 pack abs were still visable. Ben got up & grabbed another plate of food for Sam who even through he was getting full pushed through & cleaned the plate. Ben grabbed another plate for Sam who then finished that plate. Ben kept getting Sam plates of food. As Sam shoveled the food in, Tyler began rubbing & massaging Sam's bloated stomach which was helping Sam eat more than normal.
Finally after Sam had eaten 9 plates of regular food then Ben got a plate different desserts. Sam tried to protest as he let out several burps but Ben wouldn't hear it. Ben reached over & unbuckled Sam's belt then unbuttoned his pants to relieve the pressure as Tyler continued massaging Sam's stomach. As Time went on Sam was able to finish 3 plates of deserts & 2 Big bowls of ice cream. By this point Sam couldn't eat any more. His stomach was very distented & bloated. His stomach was so bloated it looked like he had eaten a soccer ball. Ben & Jake helped Sam up & then they all went back to the dorm to watch a movie. After the movie Sam went in to his room & shut the door for the night. As Sam headed towards his bed he removed his clothes except for his boxers. Sam passed his desk where he saw the package he received earlier in the day. Sam pulled out his knife & cut the tape on top. Sam opened it to find…
15122.title: Muscle & fat

choices: Sam grows to Ben's size, fat & muscle
Sam grows to Ben's size but all fat
Sam grows or shrinks height wise
151222.content:
Sam opened up the package to find a box filled with packing peanuts. Sam dug through the peanuts to find a cool looking medallion necklace the size of a large grapefruit. Sam also found a paper with what looked like instructions. They read “This medallion is magic. It will grant any wish you can imagine. To make a wish you have to be holding or wearing the medallion. You can say or think the wish. This medallion will grant unlimited wishes. The medallion will shrink & grow with you as long as you are holding or wearing it. Have fun.” Sam put the necklace on & found it fit perfectly around his neck with the large medallion resting right at top of his cleavage between his muscular pecs. Sam thought to himself, “really a wish granting medallion. Only one way to find out if this is true. Well since I need to gain weight lets see if it’ll make me gain weight in just my belly.” Sam looked down to see his belly was nearly back to normal. It was still a little bloated but not too much.
Sam spoke out loud, “I wished I gained 50 pounds in only my belly.” As soon as he stated the wish Sam’s belly began to expanding both outwards & sideways. It was like somebody had hooked Sam up to an air pump. His belly kept getting larger & larger stretching his boxers out. His boxers could only stretch so far as they began growing tighter & tighter. A few minutes later his belly had finished expanding so he looked like he was pregnant. Yet he still had a lean face. Sam poked his expanded belly to find it was so soft. His finger sunk in a good 2 or 3 inches. Sam rubbed his belly as he thought about what to do next. Sam decided to see if he could reverse it. Sam spoke out loud again, “I wish for my belly to shrink back to normal.” Suddenly his belly began shrinking smaller & smaller until he could see his 8 pack abs again. Sam thought about what he should do now. He couldn’t believe it actually worked.
151222.title: A magic medallion necklace

1512223.content:
Sam could hear the others were still up hanging out in the living room. Sam thought to himself, "I've got to tell the guys about this." Sam put his shorts & t-shirt back on then walked out to see they were all just talking & laughing. Sam pulling the medallion necklace out of his shirt so they could see it, spoke up, "hey guys. Look at this. I got this magic medallion necklace in that package earlier. It can grant unlimited wishes!" The guys burst out laughing at him as Ben replied, "yeah right. I think all that food you ate earlier made you crazy."
Sam seeing they didn't believe him said, "I'll prove it. I wish I gained 125 pounds of fat." The guys just looked at him like he was crazy when suddenly Sam began to fatten up. Sam's legs lost their definition as they grew thicker with fat filling up his shorts completely. Suddenly there was a loud rip as Sam's butt expanded beyond what his shorts could handle. His once flat 8 pack abs were gone as his belly began to grow spilling over his belt & pushing t-shirt up & out. His belly was getting so big & wide his shirt began to ride up exposing his growing fat belly. Even his muscular pecs lost their definition as they became flabby man boobs. His shirt grew skin tight as his belly, man boobs & back expanded. His arms lost their definition & thickened up filling up his sleeves completely. His neck grew much thicker. He developed a triple chin as his face became very fat finishing off the transformation.
The guys were speechless. They just saw their friend fatten up into a giant obese fat guy. Toby approached the much taller & larger Sam & asked, “can I feel your belly?” Sam responded, yeah. Go ahead.” Toby put his hands on Sam’s giant belly & start rubbing the belly finding it incredibly soft. The others came over & also felt Sam’s belly. Toby pushed his hand down in to Sam’s belly to find it went in several inches. Toby then placed his hands under Sam’s belly where it overhangs his shorts & lifted up. Toby remarked, “whoa. Even your belly feels heavy but soft. Can you reverse this?” Sam said, “yes. I wish to shrink back to my normal size.” Immediately Sam’s belly & fat began melting away. Within just a few minutes Sam was back to normal. Sam went put on a new pair of shorts since he ripped the ones he had on. Sam walked back in & said, “Jake. You said you thought you’d be stronger than me if we were the same height. So let’s see. I wish to shrink proportionally to 5 feet 11 inches tall. I wish my clothes would shrink with me.” Suddenly Sam could see everyone seemed to be growing taller when in reality it was Sam that was shrinking. Within a few seconds Sam had finished shrinking at 5 feet 11 inches tall & now had to look up to Ben. He sure wasn’t used to that.
Jake stepped up to Sam causing Sam to take a step back. Jake seemed quite a bit bigger than he thought he would. Sam flexed his biceps but as soon as Jake flexed his, it was clear Jake's were larger. Sam said, “Let’s arm wrestle.” Jake smiled as he responded, “oh. You’re on.” Jake & Sam walked over to the table & sat down across from each other. Sam spoke up, “why don’t we try arm wrestling with our right arms first? Then do our left arms?” Jake replied, “fine by me.” Once they had their their arms in position Ben counted down to zero. Sam & Jake immediately began pushing against each other trying to force the other’s arm down. At first it seemed to be a stale mate but slowly Jake was forcing Sam’s arm down closer & closer to the table. Sam pushed back with all his might. But it just wasn’t enough as Jake forced Sam’s arm flat on the table ending the match. They then switched arms. Again Sam tried to beat Jake but Jake was just too strong as he ended the match quickly beating him. Jake smiled proudly as he declared, “I really am stronger than you pound for pound!”
Of course Sam wasn’t one to give up. Sam said, “I challenge you to a wrestling match.” Jake laughed, “ you really think you can beat me in a wrestling match? I don’t think so.” Sam replied, “We’ll see. Let’s go. Help me move the couch & coffee table out of the way to give us more room to wrestle.” Jake nodded as he helped Sam move the couch & coffee table out of the way. Sam took the medallion necklace off & layed it on the table as he said, “don’t want to break this.” Sam & Jake got into position & began circling each other as Ben counted down to zero. As they circled each other waiting for Zero as Ben had started counting down from 100 for some reason on, Sam sized Jake up. Sam thought to himself, “man. I hope I can beat Jake. I hope this wasn’t a mistake. Jake seems So Much Bigger & more Muscular than me even through we’re the same height! His arms alone have to be at least 4 inches bigger than mine. Even his chest is Much Bigger than mine.” At Zero, Jake quick as lightening lunged at Sam knocking him down on to the floor. Sam felt like he was just hit by a Mack truck. Jake quickly got Sam into a hold & trying to force Sam to tap.
However Sam is stronger than he looks. Sam fought against Jake trying to get out of Jake’s hold. Slowly but surely Sam could feel Jake’s grip loosening when suddenly he broke out & attempted to pick Jake up to flip him over. However Sam wasn’t prepared for just how heavy Jake is compared to him. However Sam was sum how able to get Jake on the ground & quickly got him into a hold by wrapping his arms around Jake’s chest. Sam began squeezing as hard as he could to try to force Jake to tap. Sam thought he was about to make Jake tap. However Jake focuses the majority of his work outs on his arms, chest, shoulders, back & abs making his upper body super strong! Really much stronger than most guys of his height & size. All that work & strength training was about to pay off as Jake flexed his chest & biceps as hard as he could forcing Sam’s grip to loosen. Sam tried to retighten his grip but Jake was far too big & strong.
As Jake & Sam were wrestling, one of the other roommates walked over & grabbed the pendant necklace as the others were too focused on the wresting match to notice. Suddenly Jake broke free of Sam’s hold & flipped him over. The roommate that grabbed the pendant necklace was…
1512223.title: Sam grows or shrinks height wise

choices: Follow one of the other roommates
15122232.content:
Tyler the giant 7 feet 10 inch tall roommate picked the medallion up as Ben & Toby were distracted watching Sam & Jake wrestle. Tyler walked back over to watch the match as suddenly Jake broke free of Sam's hold & flipped him over. Jake then got Sam into a hold that he couldn't get out by wrapping his large, powerful arms around Sam's chest & squeezing. Sam fought as hard as he could trying to break Jake's hold but it was no use. The more Sam fought him the harder & tighter Jake squeezed & tightened his arms just like a boa constrictor.
As they were wrestling, Tyler thought to himself, "I wish my physique was just like Jake's. I wish my muscles were even larger & stronger than Jake's but for my height." Suddenly Tyler felt a warm tingling feeling in his calfs causing him to look down. What he saw shocked him. His calfs were actually growing larger, thicker, stronger & more defined. He looked like he had way over inflated footballs for calfs now. Then the tingling moved up to his quads. His quads began growing larger, wider, stronger & more defined causing his shorts to tighten up around his growing legs. Then the tingling moved up to his glutes causing them to grow just a little bit bigger. Then the tingling feeling moved up to his abs, chest & back. Tyler could feel his abs growing, getting harder & stronger yet he wasn't flexing them.
Then his chest began growing both sideways & outwards causing his shirt to tighten up. As his chest was growing, his back grew wider & more defined. Then his shoulders grew wider & more defined causing his shirt to tighten up even more. His chest got so Big that it caused his shirt to rise up so it showed a few inches of skin. Then his neck grew thicker & more muscular. Last his arms exploded in size & definition to finish off the transformation. His arms had to be like 28 or 29 inches. He looked like Jake except even larger & stronger. Tyler looked down at the pendant in his hand & thought, " this thing actually worked. Wow. I'm like super strong now."
Tyler walked over & put the pendant down where he found it & walked back over in time to see Sam tap as he was out of breath having all the air squeezed out of his lungs by Jake. Jake released Sam & stood up flexing as he declared, "I won. I won." Sam finally caught his breath & walked over & grabbed the pendant necklace. Sam put it on & said, " I wish I grew back proportionally to my normal height." Sam quickly grew back to normal.
Suddenly Sam looked over towards Tyler & said, "dude. Your clothes are a little tight on you aren't they? You look so much larger & stronger than you did a little bit a go. Did you use this pendant?" Tyler replied, "yeah. I used it. I didn't mean to. I only thought the wish. I didn't say it out loud. I hope you'rer not mad." Sam replied, "no. It's no big deal. But if you don't mind I'll wish for your clothes to fit you better." Tyler replied, "that would be great. I feel like my clothes are about to rip with the slightest movement." Sam said, "I wish all of Tyler's clothes would grow to fit him perfectly." Suddenly Tyler's clothes grew a little bit bigger to fit him perfectly. Sam said, "well I'm turning in. It's getting really late." The others agreed & headed to their rooms.
15122232.title: Tyler

151222321.content:
After Sam went in to his room & shut the door, Sam got on his computer & surfed Facebook & the net for a while. Sam grew tired & then stripped down to just his boxers showing off his muscular physique as he logged off then layed down on his bed. Sam couldn’t stop thinking about the magic medallion necklace he received. He thought to himself, “I know it could make someone lose or gain weight, muscle. It could even grow me taller & shrink down to average height. But could it make someone short or even super tiny? I’ve always been really tall. I wonder what it would be like to look up to most people, even up to Toby. I wonder what it would be like to super tiny. Only one way to find out.” Sam yawned as he said, “I wish I shrunk to 1/4th of an inch tall & wish my boxers shrunk with me. Sam’s eyes grew heavier & heavier as he fell asleep.
Sam slept deeply unaware that he had shrunk proportionally to 1/4th of an inch tall. The next morning Sam began to stir really early as his biological clock went off. Sam opened his eyes to find it was still fairly dark. Sam felt like his head was laying in some giant pillow that seemed to be bigger than him. But that’s impossible right. Sam looked over to where his clock should be but noticed the digital display seemed to be much larger than normal. It seemed to be as big as a billboard. The huge red numbers red 6:15 am. Sam turned his head to look towards the end of the bed. Strange the end of the bed seemed to be a mile away. It seemed to be like a vast white plain for as far as he could see. Off in the distance he could see his computer, desk & big screen tv but they were blurry as if they were several miles away. Then Sam remembered his wish just before falling asleep. Sam thought, “holy crap. It worked! That means I’m only like a 1/4th of an inch tall! Wow!”
Sam looked down to see the pendant necklace had shrunk with him & was laying on top of his muscular chest. Sam got up & walked to the edge to get the feeling like he was on top of the Grand Canyon. Sam looked around for a way down when suddenly he noticed the blanket was draped over the end of the bed touching the floor like a natural slide on a hill. 15411.content:
He wasn't proud of what he had bought. And he could be expelled from the team if they found out.

It was some body enhancing drugs his best friend Tyler recommended, made by a mysterious magic shop.

He swore they could make an full developed adult to grow an extra foot or tons of muscle. In other circumstances Sam would never believe in shaddy magic potions nor spent any money in them (although they were quite cheap).

But after Tyler showed him photos of his high school senior years, and he looked so scrawny and short than even his female schoolmates were taller than him.
Completely different from his actual self, a muscular 7'10" top basketball player that with that muscle mass if he wanted he could play football and knock down his adversaries like a bowling ball against skittles.

Growing 3 feet and 60kg of muscle in 2-3 years was impossible, unless he had got some unnatural help.

And that was why he decided to try it after his performance worsened that year due to his bad eating habits and a small lesion that took months to heal (he couldn't train during that time). So the magic drugs were his best shot to secure his place in the team.

He opened the box and found much more that he expected: There were like 50 vials, all with cryptic tags like 'second puberty', 'skyscraper' , 'happy belly', 'ladykiller', 'Samsonic', something blurry... roughly 10 vials of each type, he estimated. He didn't know which test first. He didn't know if he should, as the tags didn't say anything about its effects. The only warning Tyler had said to him was that "They hard to quit."

His thoughts were interrupted by the sound of the door opening. He heard heavy steps coming closer, but he couldn't hide the box on time.
It was his little brother... although he wasn't little anymore.

"Sam!" A imposing figure that dwarfed Sam proceeded to hug him so tightly he barely could breath. When he stop Sam got a view of his face and recognized him as his youngest brother Joey (although his features were sharper, more mature than when he was 12). His ridiculously height was one thing, but the weight of his shoulders was also incredible, like a foot broader than Sam... that enormous body cast a shadow that covered his former bigger brother. And all that body was filled with so much muscle he wondered how he could move.

"I missed you so much, big bro!"

Joey scrubbed his hand over Sam's head, hurting him a little. 4 years ago, it was the 7 footer Sam who used to do that to the little Joey to tease him.
Clearly the tables had turned.

"I'm happy to see you too." Sam said a little dizzy "I thought you were training."
"I left early. The coach told me I didn't need to train as much as my teammates."
"Surely you've grown a lot since the last time I saw you." He couldn't help but admit that fact.
"Hehehe." His little brother loved to hear that. "Yeah, I'm the tallest student ever from my High School" A title that belonged to Sam a few years ago. "And I'm not even 16! I probably have a few years of grow ahead."
"Yes, I saw your mark. 7-10 is almost a world record."
"That mark? It's from a month ago. I likely outgrew it since then. Come, help me measuring me!"

Sam didn't fancy to do it, but he gave in and do it.

"7... 11..." He couldn't believe his little brother, a teen, was already taller than the tallest person he had ever met, Tyler.
"Cool... although I expected to be an 8 footer by now."

The scary thing he had all the change of becoming one sooner than later...

"By the way, bro, I noticed you neglected yourself a LITTLE these years..." He commented pointing at his belly.
"My coach asked me to get more mass! It's good for football!" Although it was true, maybe he overdid it a little...
"I prefer gaining pure muscle mass!" Joey claimed proudly as he flexed his biceps, swelling a lot.

Joey glanced at the open box, but his older brother hurried to distract him before he could wonder what it was.

"Where's Ian, Dad and Mom?"
"They went shopping, they will arrive at any moment."

Sam felt curious about the looks of his other brother, now a high school senior. He didn't any height mark of his since the last one, from 4 years ago...
15411.title: Size change formulas coming!

Joey spent the next 20 minutes talking about his performance this season, how their team crushed the competition and how he scored most of their points.

His statistics were so absurdly great, so much better than his, than his older brother thought those were all tall tales. But he didn't dare to accuse him.

Joey was the biggest man he had seen, with muscles way bigger than his or Tyler... he had those big guns than were slightly thicker than his flexed biceps, but he hadn't flexed them yet... and had so much muscle mass his XXXXL shirt was skin tight, seemed like it was about to rip if he moved too much...

To sum up, he looked so strong, like a tank, Sam wasn't sure if those stories of scoring of him scoring 70 points could be actual true...

The trio met Joey and the prodigal son in the kitchen. His father Mike gave him a lovely but awkward hug, mostly because he was a feet shorter than his son (6'4 / 193cm), although still retaining most of his footballer build (wide shoulders and muscles bigger than you expect for a man in their late forties), but time had took its toll and gave him some overweight he tried to hide with loose clothes.

His mom Pam were a stunning woman at 6'1/185cm tall, taller than most men she met at college and that gave her a complex... that's why when Pam met one who made her feel normal who also was handsome and nice, fell in love.

She had the "really-tall-genes" (if she was a man, (s)he would be a 7 footer) who their sons inherited. His father, with "moderately-tall-genes", boosted their heights a little, but his greatest contribution was his "late-bloomer" genes (he kept growing until his last college years) that made his sons keep growing while his classmates stopped at his teens. The perfect genetic jackpot that made them almost 8 footers. Although some brothers got better deals than others (Sam)...

Like Ian.

After seeing his huge youngest brother, Sam didn't get so shocked when he saw the middle brother... although he was almost as tall as Joey, 3 inches away of matching him. He also was leaner, had some muscle but was even less than Sam's. A "quite-strong-but-agile build" perfect for his sport, basketball, during his last high school year.

His face hadn't change at all since they met, it was softer and more youngful than the manly Joey's despite being 3 year older. It was also beautiful, he could pass for a pop-star or a model if he wasn't so untypically big.

"When you left, Joey hit a freakish growth spurt and outgrew me too. That made me lose interest in marking my height in the wall." Ian explained after Sam asked why there was no height mark his.

They had nicely familiar dinner with tons of foods that quickly disappeared in front of the boys. Mike joked about having three giant sons in the house will make them broke.

"Don't worry, dad, I have several talent scouts asking me for join their teams as soon as I graduate. I'll pay my food bills with interests."
"Ian, honey, you got letters from two professional teams too." The proud mother recalled.
"Yes, but I'm not interested. I want to go through college."
"I like to hear that, son." Mike commented "And with your straight A marks and sport performance, sending you there is going to be very cheap for me."

They laugh. Sam didn't.

"I could easily get a sports scholarship too." Joey remarked, a little envious of how much attention the perfect brother was getting. But not as much envious as Sam.

He felt like his brothers were surpassing him in everyway. He had just learned Joey's ridiculously great statistics were true. And Ian's performance wasn't far behind. Whereas his last year had being rather disappointing after his lesion.

He had nothing to brag.

"Unless... I use the content of the box."

Once the dinner was over the boys went to bed. Another unpleasant surprise for Sam: His old, big bedroom was now Joey's (the biggest son needed the biggest room), and Joey's had being turned into storage, so the oldest brother had to share room with the youngest.

Another humiliation happened when Ian entered in the room naked, asking Joey about the location of his clean pajamas (hard to believe a 7'8" man still used jams, unlike Joey who slept only with his extra-large boxers). Sam found out his brother's manhood was bigger than his too, a 6.5" (16.5cm) soft penis hanging freely between his legs, whereas Sam's hardest dick was barely one or two centimeters longer than that.

And who knows how big was Joey, the huge bulge on his underpants indicated it wasn't small either.

That was too much for Sam's pride. He got up and walked to the box with the serums. He looked at them. He didn't know which to drink and how many.
Those potions were the responsible for turning Tyler from dwarf to 7'10" (238cm) titan, who knows what they could do to a 7'4" man like him...

"I don't want to outgrow the house." He said to himself, although the idea felt strangely attractive "I should begin slowly, with one or two of the most appalling."

He checked the vials, trying to decrypt their labels...

"Skyscraper probably means height... Maybe one would make me as tall as Joey." He started smirking. "Although a SAMSOMic wouldn't hurt, if it does what I think..."

A pink vial rolled to his feet. It said Ladykiller.

"Prepare yourself, Ian..."

Sam drinks one or two vials more
1541111.content:
Sam spent a strange night. He felt tingling all over his body, a hardon he couldn't get rid of (he wanted to jerk it off, but he was sharing the room with his brother) and he could swear it was slowly growing bigger every time he touched it and the tshirt and underwear he was sleeping with was growing tighter...

But the strange tiredness he felt made him forget all that and made him fell asleep.

The next morning, Sam awakened full of energy. He stood up and stretched all his body... and then noticed his abdomen was left exposed, up to his navel.
It wasn't because he had gotten fatter... it was due to his taller height.
But it didn't go unnoticed his gut was smaller than yesterday... maybe because of his growth spurt or his muscle growth...

Speaking of muscle, all of them had become way thicker in just one night. He could feel his huge pecs pressing about his tshirt and, when he breathed too deep, he heard it ripping.

He raced to the living room and went to the place where they marked their heights. Joey's last mark was at his eye level now! He couldn't contain his excitement. He made a new one, 4 inches above Joey's 7'11".

Sam was now 8'3" (251.5cm). He loved it.

He saw his little brother walking to the kitchen half-asleep. Sam approached him and hugged him, putting his muscular arm over his shoulder.

Something impossible yesterday, so easy now he was half a head taller.

"Good morning, bro!" He said too happy. "Do you notice something different?"
"Mmm... That you're irritatingly energetic at 8AM?"
"No, I mean, look at me! Don't you see something amiss?"
"...?"
"I'm fucking taller than you." Sam got tired of the lack of reaction.
"Ah, that. Big deal. Now let me grab some cereals"

"Why do you act like growing a foot in a night is normal...?" But then Sam remember Tyler told him the serums had the strange power of making the people around you accepting your changes, no matter how impossible they are.

Breakfast. Lunch with the family. Sam enjoyed his new body, and the annoyances his height created like being a foot and a half (45cm) taller than the doors (extreme ducking necessary) or his knees bumping the table somehow pleased him.

"Let's play football, Joey."

But he wasn't interested. The middle brother, almost a head shorter, accepted the challenge but only if they changed the game to basketball.

It was hard match for Ian, as his big brother had height and strength advantage, but at the end he won by a minimal point difference thanks to his accumulated skill (Sam hadn't played in ages). That annoyed slightly Sam, who expected to being invincible after the three serums.

On the positive side, Sam noticed how fast he could move, like before he had his lesion... no, he felt even better than that, than ever. He couldn't wait to check his body in the football field, specially against his little brother.

But sometimes, destiny had other plans...

15411111.content:
Evening.

"Damn, the fridge has unplugged again. Honey, could you and your brother move it so I could reach...?"

Sam didn't wait for Pam to end his petition. He grabbed the big appliance and lifted like it was as light as the air.

"Wait, shouldn't we empty it first."

He didn't need it. He left it a meter away and his mom could plug the cable in the deteriorated socket.

"Oh, how lucky I am of having a boy as strong as you."

Sam bent towards so his mother could kiss him on the cheek (on tiptoes).

That day was the best day he had had, loving each minute... but that was going to change.

He went to Joey's room for something and found his brothers inside. Sam turned pale.
His brothers were drinking vials.

"W-what are you doing?" He asked weakly.
"I found some sodas with funny names in a box and got a few ones. They're delicious."

He looked at the empty tiny bottles on the floor. There were the familiar Skyscraper, Samsomic and Ladykiller, but also a few "Second Puberty", whatever its effect was. They didn't drank the whole shipment, but they had more than a dose of each like Sam had.

"Hey, Sam, let's have a sleepover together, the three of us." Joey proposed.
"Yes, like the old times." Ian liked the idea. Sam was scared of it.

154111112.content:
Gritting his teeth, the 8'3 Sam looked down at the shorter 7'11 Joey and 7'8 Ian. Both of them didn't have a second thought of drinking those vials, and he heard a *URP* from Joey who laughed while Ian was holding back a laugh.

He was almost too blind by anger at them taking his things and now potentially outgrowing him. Though realizing how this could cause a ruckus and out his vials do, Sam barely held himself back. His mouth opened as wide as possible as he gave a forced smile.

"No. Thanks."

"Really? It'd be crazy fun!"

"Yeah. Remember when you and Ian made a hole in the wall and dad freaked out? Ot was hilarious seeing him running around the house in his slippers panicking while trying to hold a spoon threateningly! He didn't even realize it wasn't a knife till he poked me with it!!"

"Then I got grounded for a few weeks. So Im given more reasons not to." Sam moved through his tight clothes for his phone, opening it and pretending to message Tyler. "Now I have to tell Tyler" stopping himself for a moment, he smiled as the best way to keep things under control came to him "The experimental drinks he was shipping for a "friend" were consumed".

Hearing "experimental" both Ian and Joeys lips went down, their throats making noise as they gulped.

"Experiments?"

"Yes. Nothing important. A number of really powerful hallucinogenics that cause one to become delirious. Like growing bigger and nobody believing you, the world shrinking around you as no one listens and acts like you were always that big. He said it's so strong it could last YEARS." He made sure to emphasize the last part.

"Years?" Ian didn't look pleased at the idea for being treated like he's insane while believing himself to be huge.

"Years."

Joey and Ian looked at each other and towards Sam. "Does he have anything to help us?" Joey looked pleadingly at him.

"Oh yes. He said they also worked on ways to counter it, but it'd take-" both listened earnestly as he crushed their hopes "a year."

The seeat that was started to form on their foreheads, big pleading puppy dog eyes from both told Sam he might have gone tok far. But he wanted to be the biggest of his siblings. Maybe when there's two bottles of each left he'll give them some more. For now though....

"I heard acting as if everything is normal keeps the effects from worsening" more lies. Both sighed with relief, looking at each other before speaking.

"Sorry Sam."
"Forgive me bro. We thought they were just energy drinks."

"It's alright. Tyler though. Who knows how he'll react?" He shrugged to give off indifference. "As ling as you know the dangers."

"...Wait." Joey looked embarrassed and scared. Someting dawning on him. "After I found these I was visited and gave some to others."

"Who"

"It was...

Well thanks for telling me. As for your reward...." He put his phone away.
